lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone! Welcome back! (laughs) Today's been a chaotic, end-of-the-week bit of insanity.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: They can't see everyone running to get the donuts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they can't see you guys running to get your donuts, so it's fine. Our party was just scattering to the four winds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is the visual still on Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's on me. It's fine, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww, damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all right. So, anyway, guys. Welcome back. We have a few announcements. First off, thank you once again, chat, for giving me this awesome, awesome DM's cloak. We'll see at which point in the evening it becomes perfunctory. Also, apparently we had a load of other gifts that arrived.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And this is for you, Ashley.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What? A mace? Yes!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm not sure who the elf ears are for, that's probably one of you guys. Actually, you know what? I think these are for-- We have the bear, Trinket, and the ears.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, goodness gracious!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got a Trinket?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'll let you open that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god you guys, he's a puppet!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! Shut. Up.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm not sure what that's for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This has to be for the dragonborn. I think, Orion, that this is a skull of a dragonborn. To put your material components in. Open it up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so cool!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who provided these?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'll have to look that up. We had so much stuff. I'll look it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please look it up. We want to thank you before the end of the show.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: This is for Scanlan, he's on his way. And then we have-- Oh, we have the little mouse here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I gotta see that flute, though.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I believe this is for Grog. If I'm getting any of these wrong, the chatroom will yell at me and we'll figure it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, please figure it out.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: But obviously we know who this is for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we'll pass that over to his side, there.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: The only other announcement I have, guys, thank you all so much for helping us reach the shirt goal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, thank you so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, thank you!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You have a couple more hours to get the shirts if you don't have them yet. But we're not going to push it on you guys, we already reached the goal. So thank you all so much. But if you still want one, I think you have, like, four more hours and then they're gone and that shirt is no longer available.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's done after this.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Done!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's this, but gray.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And that's pretty much it. That's all I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Good luck! I hope you guys die.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! Get outta here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, there we go! And also, for Percy--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plastic on there. Pass that on over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No one is safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's amazing.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you so much. Who's the name of the guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're finding out. We'll definitely thank you before the end of today. Also, want to give a thanks out to John Dodson, who is the first to create and send off--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Our magic carpet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and it's up on a thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. I understand we're going to have quite a few magic carpets coming in. So we're probably going to be swapping out as it's used, as the game progresses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to be, "The Magic Carpet of A Different Color".

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly! So it's going to be "The Amazing Technicolor Magic Carpet."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matt, who sent these to us for our birthday?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Matt Aberny, I believe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But you're awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Matt Abernathy, I think it is.

lines.name: LAURA, ORION
lines.text: Abernathy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think. If we're butchering it, I apologize, but we love you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You know who you are. Thank you. They're awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, I had one of the first run of these Critical Role shirts returned to me. I'm not sure who, someone from Canada. So if you could e-mail me and give me your right address.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we'll research that and figure out who it was. We'll get it to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not sure who it was. But I had one returned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you're from Canada and you haven't received your shirt yet, go ahead and email one of us and we'll figure out if it's you or not. So, we'll get it to you one way or another. A couple other quick announcements for you folks. Let's see. First off, I just want to remind everyone that our intro music, for our wonderful intro you just saw, written by the amazing Jason Charles Miller, is on iTunes. So if you want that as a ringtone, or just to have the music, you're welcome to go ahead and find it on iTunes, download it. It all goes to him because he's amazing and he did it for us for free.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, and it rocks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a great song. It gets me pumped. Also, other questions come up recently asking what our soundtracks are for the show, that I play for situations. The music that I run for the show for background and situations--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zac! Travis is outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Scanlan shortly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan's in traffic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but he'll be here soon. The soundtracks used for the game generally stem from a website called Incompetech by Kevin MacLeod, who writes great, royalty-free music. He's given us permission to use it. As well as Plate Mail Games, which does great soundtrack and atmospheric music for RPGs. And Midnight Syndicate, also amazing, amazing songs. They've all been amazing. So if you guys are looking for stuff for your own games, those are where I find mine. Also, I wanted to give a big thanks to our wonderful artist, Kit Buss, who's done all the character art.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Kit, we love you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kit's awesome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Love you.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She's so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're amazing. And we'll have more to come. Last, but not least, 826LA, our charity. Marisha, do you want to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. 826LA is an after-school tutoring program and they feature in creative writing, and storytelling, and they have a Young Authors' program, which is super amazing. And they also tend to have really cool storefronts. There's one here, locally, in Los Angeles, one in Echo Park, and one in Mar Vista. But there tend to be 826s in major cities all across the country. So you should check it out, and go to their storefronts and tutor the kids and get involved. They're a really good program.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, thank you so much, Marisha. Guys, check that out. Grog, the chatroom bought you another chalice to drink. You now have many things to drink your grog from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's some fancy grog happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a fancy cup!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Woohoo!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We all got things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all got presents, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got a gun, you got a staff, You've got-- Is that a skull of your, like, younger brother?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's of my ancestor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, is that a dice holder?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dagger, bear, mace! I need to put something in this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A couple other things before we start the game. Thank you for your patience, guys. We have one present here from a Joe Alfano. Whatever it is, I haven't opened it up yet. We'll see what this is here shortly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! Seekwet pwesent!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. A present, a letter, or something really cool.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We're only six subs away from our first giveaway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, snap! "Matt, a three-by-two flying carpet, sized for six medium-sized figures, "depending on your bases. There may be some overhangs. This is one of two, the embroidery "takes some time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Another one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we now have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A new carpet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two carpets. A layered, Amazing Technicolor Magic Carpet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so I think that gets us up to speed on everything we're trying to get you guys up to speed on before the show. So, welcome to Critical Role. To give you guys a little backstory as to where we are, for those who are tuning in for the first time, oh, you are tuning in to an interesting time. This party of adventurers were tasked to locate an individual, a famed folk hero, a paladin of Bahamut named Lady Kima of Vord, who, on a vision quest, went to search out and destroy a great evil that was germinating beneath the dwarven city of Kraghammer in the Cliffkeep Mountains. The party, upon delving beneath the city, discovered it breached into the Underdark, and, following her trail, fought past duergar, ashy-skinned evil dwarves, past mind flayers and various other terrifying denizens of the Underdark, eventually saving Lady Kima after weeks of her own torture, and discovering that some great evil named K'Varn had unified these normal enemy races, the duergar and the mind flayers, the illithid. Also finding that apparently, this individual-- Yes, sir?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We should probably just go ahead and do the giveaway, 'cause we already got to six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll start in a moment once you give the giveaway.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: All you gotta do is let them know to be active in the chatroom, and that makes them a part of the giveaway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys, so be active in the chatroom, that will enter you as part of the giveaway. We've already hit that, so the giveaway should be happening very soon. So, say "hello", say your opinion, be around, and have fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say, "Vex is awesome."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say you love Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, so, it's a shame Scanlan is not here at the moment, since--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's stuck, he's really stuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's stuck on the 5.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's the fleshy thing in front of you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's ears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These are dried apricots.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those are huge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just saying it's a shame, because he's right in the thick of this sequence here. So, as the party was making their way up the shore, they found bits of the ruins that coat the entirety of the subterranean city. They found what looked like some sort of a large stone, partially crumbled fighting pit. And what looked-- As Vex, Vax, and Scanlan were stealthing over, Scanlan himself invisible, had stealthed over to scout ahead, managed to find what looked like an encampment of some kind. A series of rags and furs. A very large living space for some sort of creature. Scanlan, failing his stealth roll, seemed to draw the attention of whatever entity lived there, which was an extremely tall, large, giant-like creature, malformed, kind of pale purplish-gray skin, one squinty eye and one bulging, yellowish one, that was dragging something fleshy and bloody behind it. It turned towards the rest of the party, going to inspect what, seemingly, created the sound near its homestead. And that is where we left off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the landscape, topography, everything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, you're on the outskirts of the fungal forest that covers large portions of this island. Where you are right now is on the edge of this stony pit that's dug into the ground. It's about a 15-foot drop down into this pit, where the remnants of this encampment was, and the leftover large fire pit that's just slowly burning ember coals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Scanlan is still invisible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan is still invisible next to you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan also just texted to say, "Don't kill the giant, don't kill the giant!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Texted while driving, I might add. Don't do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He wants a sex puppet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Scanlan can just stay perfectly still, and you and I can just hide so that Scanlan can--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true, were there-- You said there were buildings around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are chunks of ruined buildings in the vicinity, probably a good 30, 40 feet from where you are. You guys are right along the edge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should duck and hide under his covers. His big, nasty fur bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (booming footsteps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, stealthing away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the two of you leap off the edge of this, down into his living, bedding area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I grab Scanlan and pull him in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you leap off, down. Both make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god! Oh, it's the Underdark! Ugh! I'm switching dice. Okay, that's much better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Favored terrain makes a ranger very happy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was horrifying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She has so many dice now, it's ridiculous

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 22.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Underdark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 and 22. All right. The two of you leap off-- The 15-foot fall is easy to tumble through and both of you land right next to this large pile of rags and furs. You both quickly dive inside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are still chunks and pieces of them, dried and/or still rotting within this pile.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (retches)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan is going to attempt to make a stealth check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT, ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this giant, humanoid beast starts lumbering forward, and you can just barely catch a glimpse at him because you guys are hiding from behind. You can see giant, saggy, fleshy ears, this kind of bulbous nose. It looks almost like tumors all across his shoulders and back. And his teeth are kind of broken and nasty, there's this black in the gums. It just kind of steps and looks over the edge (sniffs and grunts). Licks his teeth for a moment. Looks over. Takes a couple steps around the edge. Glances over towards the edge of the forest. Both of you make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Constitution?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Against his nasty-ass scent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the smell, itself, it is a terrifying, awful smell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or amazing, depending on who you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural one. Top of the game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get it out now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one gets no bonus. That is an automatic fail.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I should have rolled the one made out of meteorite, but I used the jade one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it all went wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What kind of a choice is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucked up, yeah. Meteorite wins everything.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Different energies, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If Scanlan were here, he'd say, "We need to capture the giant," by the way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He would, he would.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm saying (retches).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh! Shh! Shut up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to muffle some of the sound.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You chunked!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's disgusting!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is really disgusting. I'm sorry, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good plan (vomiting noise).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The creature suddenly whips its head over towards the pile of rags and goes (grunts and sniffs). "What's that smell?" Grabs the edge and leaps off. The impact of its weight no more than ten feet from you. You feel, even through the softness, it is still soft through the nastiness, you feel the impact of both of its giant, thick, tree-like legs slam into the stone right around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make some noise!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What do you mean? What do you want me to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan sees this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hears this, and instinctively without much recourse, his invisibility fades as he begins to form an incantation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully, he's distracted at the moment, but the large entity is going to attempt--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So helpful if he was here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I just wish--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know he's got a great plan, on the 5.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure he does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not texting it to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See if he sent something to me. Yeah, he texted me the same stuff, all right!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Guys, I'm just gonna sing a song right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, no. What he's actually going to do is, he's going to cast Domination.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is what he would want to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what he would want if he were here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its nose, you can see, dripping with liquid from somewhere inside. As you pull back your blade, all of a sudden it stops, and looks up, turns around, looking over at Scanlan on the edge. And Scanlan goes, "Hey, go for a walk." And the giant, "Okay." Climbs up to where Scanlan is, and just starts walking towards the fungal forest at the edge of the area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe call him back here and we can tie him up. Is that dumb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know! Come back!" Scanlan says, "Come back." The giant turns around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make him sit down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sit down!" It sits down. Still hasn't made its saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even sitting, Scanlan is up to its knee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen giants, to an extent, at some point, or larger creatures. An ogre would be about waist-high to this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can he talk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For just reference, there. That's about the size you're looking at.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! So he's really small.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a tiny guy, tiny guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he's like Rudy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we capture him, or should we just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan goes, "You, wha--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Capture him, capture him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You told me to do something!" You guys aren't there!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think you know how big he is--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan would say, "Capture him!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, that's what we're working through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax just backs back into the shadows, hoping the giant forgets about him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, vomit-y brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But what if we have him help us fight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I bust out my rope of infinite twine and start tying it around him? Just, a lot? A lot! Just a whole bunch. As much as possible. Because it's infinite, this twine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You get about a third of the way through wrapping the rope around his body. He kind of just sits there looking confused at you. His jaw looks slack. You continue to wrap, and as you are pulling on the second round, all of a sudden his expression goes from dull slack, to angry.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down at you, Scanlan goes, "Oops! I think it's worn off." At which point he makes a tense, physical action against the rope that you've bound him with, and before you have a moment to react, with a powerful surge of energy, breaks through all the rope that you had tied him on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are now standing at the base of him. At which--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where-- Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are on the shore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you guys are way far behind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, should we just run?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's outside!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan is outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go, go. Someone let Sam in! All right, so as this giant entity reaches over and is going to attempt to try and slam his fist down on top of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Against my AC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against your armor class, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, that hits me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't count.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 14 points of bludgeoning damage, as the hand just slams down onto your sister.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just run up the thing's back. I rolled 27 for that stealth, so presumably I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Presumably, he doesn't seem to notice you there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- disappeared-ed-ed-ed. Yeah. So I'd like to stab him in the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make an attack roll on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hey, you're wearing a cool shirt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, buddy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I miss, horribly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A one and a two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you roll the meteorite yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, not yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ding-a-ling!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hope you guys got my word that you did not try to capture him, did you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we didn't. And everything's gone horribly wrong because of that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, don't try to-- No, don't capture him, that's a terrible idea!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, you got me killed!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not what you said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's starting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's too late.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're already in the giant battle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you had been here five minutes earlier, you might have helped shape what happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have one reaction to this, as you stabbed and missed, you have a reaction as well, after you've taken it. You pull yourself from under its fist, and it's now starting to get up onto its feet proper. Oh! What you got?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's moving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's getting up now, he was sitting down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bigby's Hand. Grab him. Grapple him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grapple him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can grapple a massive beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How big?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It just says "Big."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A Large?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This creature constitutes as Huge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, an ogre comes up to his waist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can grapple a Huge or smaller creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll do. Yeah.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got this, you got this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to find out here in a second, let me pull up the spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The hand has an AC of--- No, here it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. I got it right here. Grasping Hand, all right. So use the hand's strength score to resolve the grapple. So you roll that and add eight to it. What'd you roll on the d20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? Plus eight, that's 26! All right, versus its athletics. Okay. So as it's getting up, suddenly you freak out, bring your hand up, and you summon that same sparkling wave of arcane energy that shoots out from your hands. Forms this giant version of your hand. Clings around both his arms, his torso, and tightens itself around its body. As it does, it stands up, and it's currently grappled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good job! You Dominated it earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do that with people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so mark off your Domination.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, the target takes 2d6 plus five damage, crushing, as you're now grabbing and forcing its body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not very much, nine points total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is currently grappled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I jump away as a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Go ahead, and we'll say you've been down here, Scanlan is right here, and you are right here. Not with Trinket, because you went out to scout and stealth. So that's you there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I hit my earring up, and go: Giant! Giant! Being attacked! Help!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys hear that, those of you who have earrings. Shout that out? The rest of you are starting to run.

lines.name: LIAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: (sing) Clang, clang, clang! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At full-round sprints, yeah. It's not going to be a very quiet walk for Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, I don't need to be stealthy, now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. It'll take you guys about two rounds to get there. At a full round. So--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Appreciate it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just run towards the pleasant smells.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to take out one of my-- Hunter's Mark! And one of my Sleep arrows. And I want to shoot it with my Sleep arrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a Sleep arrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome. When did that happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bought them. But I want Tiberius to make me more.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've asked for more Sleep arrows, if you can make them.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It takes a while for me to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You also still have a Grapple arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that, I know!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we've got two rounds to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But after the rope, I'm going to try to Sleep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know, I know.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It takes like at least a few hours to make Sleep arrows, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it takes a while to make a Sleep arrow, yeah. It takes like-- Yeah, we'll go into that later. All right so, you go ahead and pull out the single arrow first, or Sleep arrow first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sleep arrow first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You realize if you damage something that's asleep, it wakes back up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, put him to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm saying if you do Sleep arrow first, you hit him, then you do a second, it'll wake back up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. I'm going to do the first arrow and then I'll try to put him to sleep. Okay, smart. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just letting you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right? 25 for the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. 25 definitely hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, then eight, and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shaky flute music)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16 for the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 damage for the first hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then Sleep arrow.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nighty night!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage on that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shaky flute music)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get used to that sound.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight plus seven is 15, 16, 17. Plus Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you multiply the dice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a critical hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh sweet. Eight, 16, do I add the two for the bracers on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for the multiplication, no. It's after the fact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 16, 20, what is that? 23, 24, 25.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five for Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You put him in a coma.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's not just sleeping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as it's still standing up and you see as he's standing up now, he's reaching off to the side and he's pulling a giant club up that was kind of leaning against the side of the inner portion of this giant fighter's ring.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good choice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he pulls the club up, you pierce him in the arm with the first arrow and he looks down at you angrily. With his one giant eye glaring, and the smaller one. The second arrow pierces the smaller eye and he pulls the arrow out with his fingers, like a little tweezers, angrily. I will say, because it was a critical hit on a Sleep arrow, normally, what you would roll is 5d8 to see how many hit points it can affect. Go ahead and roll 10d8.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not damage. This is just to see whether or not you can put it to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's got to have a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 12, okay. 16, 28. And then I get another--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got access to this thing. Let me show you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're at 39.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Math is happening here. Action Math!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, one more.

lines.name: MATT, ORION
lines.text: Action Math.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's some hot math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, the arrow pierces him and he pulls it out, and you can see for a second the eye gets a little--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, come on, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He flicks the arrow off and it snaps as it leaves his fingers, and he glares down at you with his other eye, angrily. Shrugs off the effect.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man! That would have been-- that's impossible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, he still has a lot of hit points left. Sleep arrow is something to glide into later in the battle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that makes sense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that does make sense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many would've done it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't tell us that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know that. No fucking-- You're still on the beach!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I still do 47 damage on that Sleep arrow? Or that was just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no, you still did the 30 damage from the Sleep arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But a nice try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that ends your turn. That brings us back to the top of the round between you guys. So we'll wait for the rest to arrive before we do full initiative. We're just running off of the sequence of events here. Did you want to move at all or are you going to stay right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to run as far away as possible from him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, as you start running backward, we'll say to about there, he has a very long reach with a club and he gets to swing at you as a reaction. So as you go bolting, he just takes the giant club around (whoosh).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not groggy at all, you little--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Streaks it across the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're grappled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His speed is zero.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Checking the stats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he still manages to roll a 14 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he doesn't hit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you jump over the club.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll off the ground, turn around. Get your bow back in ready position, untouched. That's the end of your turn. Now it's his turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is going to-- Did you throw the daggers or did you leap up to try and backstab him there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tried to backstab him so I'm right behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you're right there. He--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's gonna shit on me, isn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- spins around. Bends down, just glares at you with his one giant yellowish eye with almost a slit pupil in it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello, handsome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it does, you feel this strange, oppressive force come from the eye into your mind, and I need you to go ahead and roll a charisma saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll the meteorite.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use the meteorite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, come on, meteorite.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's better. 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to resist whatever effect this was. You shrug it off. It looks at you angrily even more and takes its club and slams it into the ground, like a giant pouty child.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (retches) Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's-- Yeah. The smell is still present in your face. Pulls its club up to prepare itself for its next round. That's its turn. Oh, no, sorry. It also makes one attack, it gets to use the evil eye, and one attack. So, angrily, it's gonna lift up its club and slam down towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 15 versus AC?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't roll worth crap today. Club comes down (impact sound). Actually breaks a good portion of the stone on the side of this that comes up, falling backward and tumbling into a pile inside this pit. As you dodge out of the way. That ends its turn. No, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan. No, Scanlan first, and then you, and then you. So Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get to do more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he's a giant, and I'm a little thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are. Yes, he is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I should hit him. I'm going to hit him with a Lightning Bolt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should come in close.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should come in close?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I can fuck him up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. But he's big, and I'm little!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't come in close, seriously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're real little, like the size of a toe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honestly, he can still get you from where you're at. Unless you move further away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so it's the same: right up against him or five feet back. Same same! If you move away, he's gonna take a swing. I'm not saying any of this, I'm just thinking it, furiously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, thinking it at me.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You yell it across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just make-- Does Lightning Bolt come from me, or can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it comes from you. And it goes in a straight direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, I have to move anyway, so that I don't strike Vax or Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the feeling he has about a 15 foot reach with this, so as long as you stay within that reach, you're still gonna be okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, will I hit either of my fellows from where I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently? Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, then I need to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Where are you going to move?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, they can't take it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That ring, is that high? Low?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 15 feet up, so you can jump down into the ring if you wanted to go down there. Or you can move around this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh gosh. I don't really jump well. All right, I'm going to jump into the ring, I guess. And then can I shoot from there or will the wall be in my way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's big enough where you'd be able to see him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you leap off the side. As you leap in the air, he glances over with his large eye and does a backswing with the club in mid-air, trying to basically baseball-swing you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he'll hit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll find out. That is an 18?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take 19 points of bludgeoning damage. As he (impact sound).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tee-balls you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Really. Like, backhand swing hits you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does a 20-- Is that good?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 will do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 20 will do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Down below. You're down in the pit, you're looking up. This gargantuan humanoid is still standing above you, looking down hissing at you as you still manage to not be affected by its swing at you. You can now cast your spell if you'd like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will cast Lightning Bolt on his face and neck area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll 8d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 8d6, give me those sixes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Boom! How many do you need? I got much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need all of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity, he does not make his saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is too slow at that size.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, a lot of sixes. Six, six, six.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What am I doing right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are running up to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 31 total?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 31?! Nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Drop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Smoke is (sizzle) up off his torso. He looks very pissed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I get my bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I give Inspiration to mister Vax over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (bad flute playing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, can you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (slightly less bad flute playing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, some Jethro Tull up in here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) You got the touch! You got the power!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say the mild, echoing sound of mildly off-key whistle following a mighty Lightning Bolt, is inspiring enough. Go ahead and take a d10.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now it is your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use that. I want to make an acrobatics check. I want to jump up on this guy's knee, and then dagger-dagger right into his strange eye that he tried to mess with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so are you going directly for the eye?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The eye, yeah, so I want to jump up his body, off his knee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sultry) Jump up his body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what do I do? Acrobatics check first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so four. I'm going to use Luck. 19 for the second, so that's 19 plus 13, so I'm pretty sure I succeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slow motion towards its face. Go ahead and make your first attack, since you are going directly for the eye--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say that it is at a disadvantage on the attack, but if it hits, it will be considered as a Sneak Attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Say that again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say it's a disadvantage on the attack, but if it hits him in his eye, you will do Sneak Attack damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good, and that's also good, identical, so that is a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. All right, that one will hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, meteorite die. Okay, so this is 1d-- durdee durdeedoo?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hurkee durkee durkee.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that's a two, plus six is eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight, plus your 5d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, this is a Sneak Attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you hit him in the eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, this is the second attack that you did, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, you were both going for the eye. I'll say, I'll allow it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, you're a nice guy. Eight, is 12. And is 17. And 18. And 22. And is 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 points of damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eyeball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, the first dagger you attempt to swing down, he actually moves his face out of the way and it just scrapes across the side of his cheek, doing nothing more than a scratch. But the second blade strikes true, slamming into the side of the eye. As it pierces, for an eye, you expect, would pop. It's still a hearty material. You actually have to push into it, it's almost like it's full of hot muscle on the inside of its eye. The dagger still drives in, and, using your weight, you drag down and cut it open on the bottom. It screams out in pain and pushes you off. You barely manage to catch yourself on the ground.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't, seemingly, blinded him, but you've definitely left a serious mark on his eyeball.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. He's huge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to use your movement at all, you can, or do you wanna stay where you are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will Disengage and move back, which means that he can't take a swing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, you can use your bonus action. Oh, you used your bonus action to do your secondary attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty sure I get that on top of that, as a Rogue hoo-hah. But I'll stay there if you want. I'm in no mood to argue with you tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure as a rogue you can use your bonus action to do Disengage, that's one of the benefits. But you used it as a secondary attack to get Sneak Attack, so. You could move out of the way, but you'll take a swing from him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, I'll move back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you'd say you'd move back to about there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the other hand, picks up the club and backhand swings at you. That'll be a 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Couldn't just let him go in the trees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as the hit slams into your back, you manage to just catch your feet underneath you so you don't topple off the top of this edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ends your turn. What you got, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi. I'm going to do Hail of Thorns on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you pull back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same wooden shaft, all of a sudden, sprouts these nice, thorny, jagged spikes on the sides, as you release the arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so that would be-- I'm doing it at a level three, so that is 3d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3d10 damage. Go ahead and roll that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15, 16. That 16? Yeah, 16 damage for that, plus my Hunter's Mark. 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then my second attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second attack. Go ahead and roll it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does hit. He's pretty big. He's a big ol' sack of hit points and no armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, plus Hunter's Mark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, don't forget your Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five for Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 22. Nice. All right, so, one arrow hits him in the elbow and it looks like it pierces the sinew that holds the arm. Almost goes slack for a second before he flexes and tenses. You hear the actual wood shaft snap as he brings his forearm up. Grabbing his club, turning around, you shoot the back of his elbow, causing him to drop the club on this hand. He looks extremely frustrated at the process. Now he's got blood streaking down both arms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches down to grab the club, again, to try and prepare himself for another round of attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we there yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are just now arriving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Fomorian is going to finish its turn, and then the rest of you guys can go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Small jump. Lands on the ground, takes one swing at each of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can he move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he still grappled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no that's a valid point. He is still grappled. Thank you for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to try and break from the grapple for his move. That is going to be an athletics of 20. Go ahead and roll a d20 and add eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Attempts to break free of grapple, can't do, so he's stuck where he is. He currently has nothing in range to attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're 15 feet below, he doesn't have range on you at the moment. He tries to take a swing at you, but partially because he's so high up, he cannot move. And because you are so small, you literally just stand there as the swing-- The wind blows your hair back a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But does not find purchase on your body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a little dainty gnome! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Completely wasted its turn, well done. All right, so that brings us to you, again. Actually, no. It now goes to everyone else because they have all arrived on the scene now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right, good, thank god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all starting to appear. We'll say--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't kill the giant!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over this area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't kill him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't kill him, still?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't kill him, we need him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How are we going to use him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's our way in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, if we can keep him controlled. I can get him mind-controlled on our team for 30 days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. He is our ticket into the palace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going to be like that one scene in Lord of the Rings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That one scene?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where he ate the Lembas bread?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love that one scene.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, who's going first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should we roll initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we haven't rolled!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody all together, now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone all together, now. All together, now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sings) All together, now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he a giant? Like a giant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's considered a giant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I speak Giant!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You speak Giant?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say something, Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I speak Giant!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I can use my brain for something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have 25 to 20? 25 to 20. 20 to 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cleric and the sorcerer.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That close, Ash.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't like going first.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That close to just spitting out all my coffee.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I like picking up the pieces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Percy and Keyleth. All right, so, ten to five. Ten to five?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That's me, I'm an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're an eight, all right. We got Vex--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's Trinket, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's so cuddly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that is almost everyone. Who--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One! Yeah, Scanlan! All right, Tiberius and Pike, you're up first. As you guys rush on the scene, seeing this creature being currently crushed by the semi-ethereal, giant arcane fist of Scanlan. Pike, Tiberius, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Go first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to see the giant fist of Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Many have before.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll follow suit, and be like: Oh, is this what we're doing? Scanlan! What are we doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're capturing the giant, and don't remind him I'm here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Capture!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, uh, very well. I'll Watery Sphere and help him maintain him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to use your Aqua Sphere?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, what is the effect on Huge creatures?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Like, it's a dope-ass effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what it says in the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What it officially says?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yep. Wizards of the Coast, page 304.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the spell name?

lines.name: ORION, MATT
lines.text: Watery Sphere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here we go, got it right here. A Huge or larger creature automatically succeeds on the saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you create the sphere around it, the water forms around its physical form. It doesn't seem to be affecting it. It's large and strong enough to the point where it's thrashing, because he's holding it in place, but the sphere is just having no effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He smells slightly better than he did before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does. There are cleaner portions of his flesh. This creature's a little larger than what you're used to capturing with a sphere.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What are you talking about? How big is it?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: He's Huge!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Look how big he is!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at how big he is compared to us!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is an ogre!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can capture those, but not that guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you were tickling his nipples with your water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He got a little bath.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So, hold on. I knew that! I do that to wash him off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Because he's really stinky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's much cleaner!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I'm swirling around, I'm like, does this feel good, giant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right. Pike, what you got?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to make a Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to make a Spiritual Weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But with a grappling hook on the end. So it will spin around him real quick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A Lariat of Truth?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And keep him in place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right, so you're creating a Spiritual Weapon. We'll say this can be considered just an additional grapple.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll just use this as the Spiritual Weapon, in his space, currently. It begins to wrap around him rapidly. One, two, three, four. And finds purchase on its own self, holding it in place. So, there we go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Double grapple!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to move with your turn, or you want to stay there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where am I at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, I want to get a little closer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, whoa!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just hold on a minute, I want to-- Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's getting closer to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The gnomes are like tent spikes, holding him in place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, real fast, guys. Let's see if we have the--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Currently washing his hump.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god, is the beholder attacking? Is it now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I want to make sure we have the laser pointers for you guys. Everyone forgets those.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, do we have more? I've got one right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I have one, here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Throw it to that table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have two over there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got one over here. Two over here.

lines.name: MARISHA, ORION
lines.text: Three over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Good to know. Thank you for your patience.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I roll for damage or anything like that? Or, since it's a grappling--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the purpose of what you want to do with this grappling hook, it's not going to do any damage to him. It's just going to be an additional grapple to him, holding him in place.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hold off on Raging. I can't talk, right? If I'm freaking out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to talk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can talk but it comes through in single words, and usually not in a diplomatic way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. So I call out in Giant, "Nipple Taint, Knuckle Broom!" which means, "Brother! We "seek to fight a great evil! Perchance, would thou carest to join us in such a fight? I have ale."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Inspiration? Anybody can--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. Would you like to join us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whose turn is next?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. Next after this is Vax.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're just appealing to his reason?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go next? And help him out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's ahead of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not worth the trouble. But we would love to pay you in ale to join us on a much better fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a persuasion roll with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I get a massive plus one. Five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. It worked! I think it worked!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) And spits a basketball-sized loogie onto the ground in front of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So disgusting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say that diplomatic attempt on him would be your action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch. Can I rage as a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would be raging as a bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (incoherent rage shouting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, do you want to move as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're so small.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I'm right at testicle height.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is not good. No, I'll stay right where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That gets us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go stealth. And then, this ring. This is a wall, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a big 15-foot wall that goes down into this pit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, going stealth, is that a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going stealth, for this, I would say, would be considered part of your move. It's a disadvantage if you're stealthing while moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, I still want to do that. So I'm going to try to scurry over the wall there, and go stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, for you, isn't Hide the stealth ability that you can use as a bonus action?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's part of the cunning actions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that would be it, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be your bonus action to attempt to stealth, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so roll to stealth, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was still terrible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's two Luck points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, all right. I'm not stealthed, but I run over by--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll? You don't know if you're stealthed or not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Five and a-- Oh, sorry. It was so pitiful. 16 and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not pitiful!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is for me. 16 and 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sarcastically) So pitiful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, you want to talk pitiful for stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, you may or may not be hidden. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I want to roll over the side of the wall, and then just move along over by Scanlan. Between Scanlan and the giant, and just hold my attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can trigger that down the road, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wouldn't be able to wait. You'd have to wait until next turn. You can't hold part of your turn, you've already taken--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm going to stab him in the knee

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so are you shimmying along the side? He's 15 feet above you. You're down 15 feet. You would have to throw a dagger to hit him at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'll throw it in his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's really ugly. You throw a dagger up towards him with your action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, that's no good. And then the bonus action is also no good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've already used your bonus action to go stealth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, they're gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four and a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus-- I didn't sleep at all last night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tell me what your final numbers are!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12 and ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Both of those, unfortunately miss. You fling both. Unfortunately, the process of jumping down and running, as you chuck it at the end of your movement next to Scanlan, even though he's bound, you're just a little off your game. It just cascades out of sight and then vanishes, appearing back on your belt. That brings us to Percy and Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go first. Okay, I'm going to-- Where am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to scoot in over here and make my way. And as I'm running by, I'm going to take a shot at his kneecap and see if I can prone him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, Bad News.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we still trying to capture him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to knock him down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we're trying.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You can do non-lethal damage to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And he's grappled?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Twice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's grappled and he's now prone. But I'm going to do my 1d10 damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's double grappled. Shit, I forgot that he was already grappled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try to talk to him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 15 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He takes 15 damage and he's prone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Arrgh!" (heavy impact)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't fall on me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to finish scooting down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will-- (laughs) Okay, so, as you shoot off the kneecap, he tumbles forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over the edge. This way. Both of you guys make dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't win!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, that's a cliff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's an edge, with a 15-foot drop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 50-50 shot on which side he fell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's my dice?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I spent a Grit point for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's my 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, here it is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 15, or five-zero?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slamming onto his back on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we get free attacks on him? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but you're nearly crushed by an extremely large person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take it. That's a plus, that's a positive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Percy, does that end your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not doing anything else for this turn. That went poorly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to-- Can I move, can I get to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's 15 feet down. You can move up to the edge, here. Look down and see him on the ground, currently restrained and struggling on his back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I turn into a snake, can I get down there? Big snake? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you would be able to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to turn into a giant constrictor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to constrict him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Real big snake! Yeah, I'm going to constrict him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sings) I'll use this naga figure for that.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm a naga!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are grappling the hell out of him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm so pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leap down? And you're trying to grapple him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to start constricting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, you might have to talk to him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll a d20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the strength bonus of the form?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get a plus six. Oh wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's it say for the constricting? It should have the rule there for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a strength--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you add six to that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- bonus, I guess. So 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You start moving around and even though he's still struggling in his form, he gets one hand up and is holding you at bay. You have not managed to grapple him yet, but you are in the process of trying to. Next round you can try again. He's pretty strong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When are you clever folk going to get in his head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am going to-- Has he taken a lot of damage yet, or are we just keep grappling him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks-- There's been a lot of grappling this past round. He took a lot of damage before everyone else showed up and it's been just a lot of holding him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The second time with a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't see him right now, because he's fallen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to scootch up there so I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just hold him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And now you see him on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to take two shots at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Both of these shots are at disadvantage, because there's Keyleth currently trying to wrap around him as a giant snake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She'll be fine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we were trying to capture him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We are. She can knock him out, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So just each attack with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just roll really high both times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Second attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Second attack is a Sleep arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Secondary Sleep arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go to sleep!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go to sleep, go to sleep, go to sleep!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 also hits. All right, so go ahead and roll damage on the first arrow, with your Hunter's Mark damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then the second one--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're putting the hurt on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's ten, 11, 12. 16 on the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16, okay. And then go ahead and roll 5d8 for the Sleep arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right, I only get 5d8.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, wasn't a critical hit, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Okay. Look at all these dice I have! 14, 20, 22?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22? As the arrow sinks into him, you see him struggling against both the snake form and Bigby's Grasping Hand. As it struggles and throws about, the grappling hook tightens on its form--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Sleep! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you do it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She has a Sleep arrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You had another one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I have three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now she has one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now I have one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Shh, everyone whisper.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (normal volume) What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Rock him, Keyleth. Rock him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't wake him up. Don't rock him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, for the moment, combat is paused. You guys do what you need to, but be aware that every period of time, he's going to be making saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, we have a mind flayer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Clarota, can you Dominate him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Clarota is a mind flayer, it's his bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota steps forward and goes, "I can, for a short period of time, or I could just take its mind."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sounds of protest)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You mean for a snack, though, you're saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would then have its memories and knowledge at my disposal."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can't control its body?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We need more of his brutish, tank-ish strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was your thing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, so short time means what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Until it resists the influence."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Until it resists, that's no good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's very temporary.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Could you perhaps put him to sleep for the evening?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or can we figure out a way to restrain him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, can we quickly tie him down while we're talking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because here's the thing, I have an ability where I can use Geas. And cast Geas on him, and I basically give him a command and he'll essentially become our big--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it lasts for 30 days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He'll be our big, beefy minion for 30 days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And if he resists it, he takes psychic damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have have manacles, and we have chains.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put him in the Bag of Holding!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's frickin' tie him down. At least can we tie him up right now?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We'll secure him, but Clarota, could you prolong the Sleep spell for eight hours so we can rest and you could do your spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For eight hours, no. Nothing in my repertoire lasts that long, which is why I say let "me take his mind."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't wanna!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a big ol' feast, I know, I know. It's a lot of food for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm hungry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You had a snack not that long ago.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I hand him some jerky. It's really delicious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Clarota, what about the thing he was carrying? Can you eat that thing's brain?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry about his dinner right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, what was he dragging? Wasn't there a corpse?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's figure out how we're going to control it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think we can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's manacle it. Let's at least try to hold it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Chain it up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chain it up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you make the manacles big? Can you Engorge the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The creature begins to flutter its eyes for a second. Clarota immediately looks down and puts his hand out and releases a force of arcane sparkles that cover its body, and it falls back asleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you make the manacles bigger? Giant-sized?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they're inorganic. I can't do anything to those.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we just use chain and tie him up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Harry Potter! Engorgio! No?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Engorgio?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have chain?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have chain. Grog has chain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's chain him up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We chain him up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a knockout drug, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know much about drow poison.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
