lines.text: Go ahead and make a nature roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy and I chain him up. We use the chains that we have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? You know that drow poison, for the most part, would not facilitate keeping something alive.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right, it is poisonous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While everybody's discussing, Vax is going to walk down to the center of the pit to take a peek at that hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever this pit was previously used for was almost like a gladiatorial experience. You can see what looks like some clusters of old, ancient bones at the bottom. Mostly seen disuse for hundreds of years.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should drag him over there, just in case he wakes up. Kick him in.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's fine. If he did something, we'd kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have the spell, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I take time, if we grapple him and I take a rest, essentially, almost take a 20 to cast Geas on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does Geas take to cast?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's a minute to cast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Generally takes a minute to cast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. We'll see how long you guys can keep him restrained.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have chained him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have chained him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With our puny chains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are getting the chains around him, he maintains his slumber. You guys continue to bring the chains around. It's a big body and there's a lot to get around. How much chain do you guys have total, by the way, length-wise?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's 150 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 150 feet of chain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We also have our never-ending rope, don't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, we do have some more never-ending rope. And we can keep using that. A lot of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never-ending rope doesn't grow on trees, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get the chain-- full length of chain around his torso area. You start getting it around his legs, you start pulling the rope around. He begins to wake up once again. He begins to thrash about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently still grappled. Clarota releases another Sleep spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we put a fancy robe over his nasty eye, so he can't give you the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah, why not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have eight fancy robes. I take one of them and I put it over his nasty pirate eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take one of your eight fancy robes you had kicking in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They were in the closet, nobody wanted them! But now they're coming to use, so suck it up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Let me sleep, hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is probably the nicest thing this creature has ever worn. Just keep that in mind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a pair of pants hanging off his eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's doing what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's just casting, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess you can help me out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to inspire her, somehow.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to encourage success.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to inspire her with a song.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to see if I see anything more than just spikes down in the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth-- Oh, never mind. Can anybody make it look like there's a big feast in front of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24? You do see what looks like some sort of mild glimmer of metal that amongst all the rest of the weapons and armor that have been destroyed down there, one seems to have resisted the age, that has stayed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a plain old 50-foot rope. I'm going to try to tie it to something on the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a pit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While they're chaining him up and everything, I'd like to walk up and put my great axe just under his chin. Just as a reminder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keyleth, you're casting?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we'll say--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has to succeed on a wisdom saving throw against me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get there. It takes you a full minute to cast it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Every round he gets to resist the Sleep spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Percy! Could you give me a hand over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure, all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) There's something down in this hole. Do you think you could hold on to this tightly while I climb down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I've got it. I've got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Classic line.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no. This spell just puts them straight to sleep. So, this spell, he is asleep for the duration. You finish your Geas spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It worked on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They all work on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's nothing in there. I keep drinking out of it. There's nothing in it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Grog, there's a diamond up my butt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so we have Geas. So it has to make a wisdom saving throw. So what is the DC? Spell DC.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, stop posing for just a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spellcasting DC.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, it's wisdom. Oh, against my spell save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, all right. As the Sleep spell wears off, his eyes begin to flicker and you see the strength flexing in his muscle form. As you hold the axe there, his one slashed but, you know, not bleeding in this moment, eye. It seems that a lot of the fancy robe has absorbed whatever was oozing from it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very absorbent fancy robe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He glances down at you. In this horrible, guttural series of phrases and consonants (speaks Undercommon).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's he saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone speak Undercommon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's not Giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I speak two languages!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You speak Undercommon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but not, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He says, essentially, "What have you done? What do you need?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I speak back to him. And say, "K'Varn. For him, or against him?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, good, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a political rally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its eye, slowly, tweaks over back towards Keyleth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you ask of me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex, how do you say, "Follow our orders," in Underdark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's, (gibberish).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The accent is on the 'kh'.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be all like, 'kh'.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you got it. Back of the throat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gibberish)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes. Very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The giant takes a moment, and his head nods slowly, like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it like a French person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Manages to get the gist across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) I don't know what you're saying. Oh, 'unh'! Oh, I understand now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do I say 'kill'?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (retching noise)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at him and I go (retching noise) K'Varn!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That accent was terrible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up, Percy. I'm not from here, clearly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone knows that, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (retching noise) K'Varn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down at the chains and looks expectantly at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Follow our orders.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm? Oh.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Take the chains off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we take the chains off?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I believe we should take the chains off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make him agree, first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems to be in agreement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can tell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You roll with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start taking the chains off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You our posse now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very carefully, taking the chains off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the chains off and as each hand is free, he (grunts) shakes it free.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you kind of jump back for a second and places it on the ground and stands up to his full height around you. I'll assume that you're no longer a naga as you cast a spell. Eventually, he gets to his full height and stands there looking down at all of you. Kind of glancing around, grabs the large, hardened piece of wood and stone that he's fashioned this club out of and glances and says to you. You translate for her. "Where?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A man of few words.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wants to know where.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I saunter up. Hello.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Christ.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm really impressed. Are you our friend, now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, do you speak Underdark?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a translation barrier going on.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, well, wonderful! Tell him to follow our orders. That's all he needs to know for now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I already told him that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's in our posse.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's asking where. We should tell him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But tell him to stay for now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you, here, for now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's going to translate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You. We roll together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Jesus! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go ahead and translate that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Vex, you got that? Could you translate that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't even understand what-- (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, do you want to tell him what she said?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to say we roll deep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's saying that he should wait here until our instructions to attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and translate that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, oh, uh. (speaks Undercommon)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slings the club onto his shoulder with a hefty (impact sound). You all feel the actual impact on his body, just the nearby presence, the air around him being pushed. Looks at you for a second. Looks back to Keyleth and gives a solid nod and just stands there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take that as a good nod.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will this keep up while you're sleeping? Just curious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It keeps up for 30 days.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 30 days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh we're set.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I walk up to the giant and I take out my jerky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we heal him? If we heal him, will it cancel it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex'ahlia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ask him what his name is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hand reaches down and completely envelops your fist. And just pulls away. Jerky is gone from your hand and you feel, probably, a few scales went with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Vex-'ah-lia."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Do we all have to say it that way, Vex'ahlia?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just glares at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, come on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (speaks Undercommon) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The big eye squints in confusion at the tiny thing. And just keeps licking the remnants of beef jerky off his fingers that it just robbed Tiberius of.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He likes the jerky.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought I'd try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What should we call him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should name him--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We should ask his name and be polite.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did, he didn't give it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should name him Tiny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tiny!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tiny, that's clever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax and I are still getting something out of there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the two of you guys move towards the pit. You're what, now? You are--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm lowering him down on a rope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You hold on, you get down. The spikes, now that you are up close, you can see, are about five and a half feet in length.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the base, about that wide. And pretty nasty, jagged, covered in whatever rust, soot, ash found its way there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tetanus, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's nasty times. It's going to be a little careful to get in there without hurting yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make just a straight dexterity check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. You manage to, Mission Impossible-style, swing underneath, grab the rope. You manage to keep yourself at a lithe, side angle where you reach between two of the jagged spikes. Reach down and grab this metal pole that was shining. Pull it out and it's an intricate gold and bronze javelin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You found booty?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pull me up. Well, I can't use this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a javelin. It's beautiful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will you inspect it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beautiful things should go to Pike, I think.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, Scanlan, but she has really good aim.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She doesn't really throw sharp, pointy things. This would be good for you, big guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just feel that the gold of the javelin would match the gold of your heart.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, Scanlan!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to inspect it. Arcana check. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm still holding it. Tell me about it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, this is, of course, the Javelin of Lightning. This javelin is a magic weapon. When you hurl it, and speak its command word, it transforms into a bolt of lightning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds a little "read"-y.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bolt of lightning, five feet wide. Basically, it's just lightning. But in a javelin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pass it on to Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spin it, rotate it in my hand, handle towards Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singsong) I have something that's magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you going to name it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Penelope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys now stand on the outskirts of Yug'voril. We're a little ways from Yug'voril and the fungal forests. In the distance, you can barely see the dull, greenish glow of what encompasses the top of the temple. What is your plan of action, as you've now bound a Fomorian to your will?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should hop down into the pit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fomorian?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of spikes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no, not that pit. In the big pit. And rest. And that way we're blocked from view.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Heal our, what are we calling him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tiny. Heal Tiny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a Fomorian?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just before we rest, does anyone have knowledge of his race and his species? Any of his weaknesses or strengths? Can I do a history check?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll do a history check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this will be more of a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a one.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Nature check? What kind of check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, this would be a-- This will be just a nature check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are we checking?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nature check. Just to see, what are his strengths and weakness? What about his race?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh! The Fromorians. Well, the Fromorians--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Foh-morians.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For-morians.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Foh-morians.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Foh-morians.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: FOH-MOH-ree-ans.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Foh-MOH-ree-ans.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Accent is just terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: An 18 plus ten, so 28. Fomo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Between you and your understanding of the Underdark, as well, you manage to suss out a Fomorian is a long-cursed species of giant that lives in the Underdark, specifically. That's why its form is so malformed and physically messed up. They are inherently very evil, very selfish creatures and the fact that you even have it in your presence says well of your magic, but also means it's probably very, very, very minimal in its control or ability to really help you unless it absolutely has to.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The giant guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Well, I mean, it sort of has to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't have to do it with all its heart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It starts to fry his brain if he doesn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sometimes things might want to take damage, depending on what you tell it to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It depends on what we say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, can we ask him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just saying you're riding a very fine line keeping this thing not thrashing and smashing your head right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we ask him, I mean, if K'Varn is annoying to him, or if he likes him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ask in Undercommon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The best you can get out of his response is the equivalent of, "I don't really know or care. I "hunt. I find things that wander too far from this city. And occasionally squash a dwarf or two."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know what sorts of things he either hates or likes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got a distraction!

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Forget the fight. We can just send him off into the city and that should be enough for us to sneak in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty good, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's true.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I am not setting foot in that temple quite yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no. We'll come up with an idea, but, I mean, it's something. Keyleth, is it safe to sleep next to him? Or is he going to attack us when we sleep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We might be able to box him up, or maybe we should chain him up while we sleep or something. I don't know. I mean, he should be okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take the watch, like we normally do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima, looking at him, says, "I'm not sleeping next to him."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll sleep near you, Kima.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her eyes, for a moment, seem to dart to your shoulder where you had previously shown her your awkward, purple, third nipple. "I'm fine, Scanlan, but I-- I appreciate the offer?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Suit yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's just a sentence you don't hear very often.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a question. You said he's a cursed giant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning, not him, individually. His actual species long ago. It was a line of giants that was cursed by the Fae to be this horrible form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In shifts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can chain him up to something while we sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. We don't want to seem aggressive towards him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fine.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He's fine for 30 days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's taking the first watch? All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the first watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I gotta heal up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll sit up with Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, hang on. What are we doing from here? Because it's going to dictate what I pick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a good question. We're not going to mount our full attack, are we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, we are not.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I am telling you right now, I am not setting foot in that thing's lair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, tell us why.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Until when?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Until we figure out a damn way to get it out of that lair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want it out of the temple.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not going to be able to do that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Percy! I'm saying this right now, I'm not stepping foot in that lair!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. We're not going to be able to get him out, I don't think.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think we can, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: My idea is this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yes. Please, tell us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: With the new addition of our giant friend, we do have a great advantage. We can definitely make the distraction, as you say. I propose, Keyleth and another stealth member somehow see a way if there is some kind of ventilation that leads into the Major Butthole's chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The temple that you won't set foot in.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want somebody else to go into.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And, when finding this, craft some type of piping system where we could smoke him out. If he has to breathe, which I believe aberrations need to breathe and eat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I know that? Do aberrations need to breathe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best that you understand, not a lot of study has gone into the breathing apparatuses of certain aberrations and the few that have been close enough to a beholder haven't really tested that theory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If we smoke him out and he cannot breathe, he must leave the facility. And if we go in there we would be at an extreme disadvantage in many ways than we realize.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are we going to smoke him out?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I just proposed the idea. I don't know, but that's what we all need to figure out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I've also got an idea. I mean, what about that whole plan to break apart the apparatus that was holding the Elder Brain together?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my thought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we need to go over the top, once the distraction is in the city, blah blah blah. Go over the top, acid that metal, break it apart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or giant that metal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it'd be hard to get the giant up to the top of the temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we can send the giant beating on the front temple door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But this is a brainstorming session, everything's positive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, not everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acid, whatever, break it apart. Release the illithids from his control and then we'll have them on our side. At least, not our side, but against him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what I'm talking about.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, so there are prisoners, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of the illithid in the city are his prisoners. He's controlling everyone.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, so, I'm sorry, I was misled earlier. So this is the good part of the plan. We do exactly what you're saying, first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. That's good. I like your plan so far.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Clarota, here, will rally the illithid to fight for us. That's when we smoke out the beholder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Except, of course, by doing that, we've destroyed the roof of the chamber, so there will actually just be nothing but ventilation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it was already open, remember?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We do it a different way. We don't go near him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we know that it's enclosed?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can get the giant inside the temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The top has the brass crossbar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But what if he just controls the giant?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, though? The beholder will just take control of the giant.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That we're talking about destroying?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some sort of glass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some sort of translucent material that fills in the parts that aren't the brass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That we're talking about destroying.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: The room that he's in is sealed up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should keep the giant as a distraction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I also have an idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ice cream and peanut butter mixed on a cold stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It will never work. It'll never work!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yum!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That is incredible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been thinking about it for days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How would you get the stone cold enough? You would need all sorts of sides to add to it, to fold into it. It's a terrible idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I told you, I don't like thinking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then also another idea. What if you used your Pillars, right, against the Beholder and trapped him in? Can you do that?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I am not going anywhere near that temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, all right. What if you're outside the temple and you cast Pillars and then we go in? And you stand outside, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I mean, I suppose that could work, possibly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you're on top?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just has to be line of sight, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To where you want the pillar to come out of, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Mm-hm, right, yeah. Actually that could work. I could do it from afar, maybe on the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That gives us something to hide behind, right? At least, with his eyeballs.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We still have to go through the fungal forest, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far is the forest, before the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, to bring the map on top, here. Where you guys currently reside, which is this portion here. You imagine, based on the distance you traveled, you have about a mile or so before you get to the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A mile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe a little over a mile.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Man, I wish we had some Cold Stone right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually probably a mile and half before you get into the city, which is about two miles from the temple.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right? Doesn't that sound amazing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to find a frost giant, first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just saying, we could leave this fucker here, go mix some peanut butter and ice cream, everybody's happy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That plan is growing on me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll sleep. Should we nap?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's take a rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we going to do? We're just going to go in without a plan? What are we going to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How's Vax's foot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tomorrow we can stealth in and get some intel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's already been attempted to be healed this day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we can do it in the morning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's like a once a day kind of thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Liam, we need you to stealth in and get some awesome recon, but that means you'll be at risk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to need to destroy the mechanism.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A suicide mission? He was born for this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to do that before we teleport.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Okay, here's my thing. Why do we need to do reconnaissance? We already know what we need to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've already done reconnaissance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we saw through Keyleth's Scrying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, so we know what's going on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somewhat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know that there's a mechanism inside that room. We know that that's probably what's keeping the brain.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think Pike's onto something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should do some recon. There might be beings or creatures around there that we can distract, use to our advantage, something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should get up close, release the giant, fly up over, do our shit, and then take him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, but we don't know how we're going to break that thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have acid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have acid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I bring out the yellow vial.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we've got a bunch of acid in Grog's bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do have that yellow vial.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have four acid vials, plus that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This is the thing that's going to hurt the most.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know. It could make it stronger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mean, I could do some Heat Metal and weaken it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like we should save that acid for the beholder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Remember, the argument was also that it will be magically treated to withstand simple acid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Elder Brain casing was, not necessarily the cross.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to experiment on the-- I want to do a couple things. I want to first take, using my little kit, I want to just beaker off a tiny bit of it and expose it to some organic matter to see how it reacts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And expose it to a little bit of inorganic matter to see how it reacts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take a bit of the swirling, yellow, orange-ish viscous fluid out of-- You place it against some organic matter, which, you find somewhere in the vicinity, partially rotted chunks of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Flesh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- flesh from the pile the Fomorian was sleeping on. As you place it on, it blackens the flesh around it. There is a sizzling sound.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting. Now I want to try it on some inorganic matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which organic matter? Which inorganic matter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have any metal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a dagger that I never use.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have some rusty instruments.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Rusty instruments?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: From the torture room.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sorry. What? I don't understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like a couple things. I would like one of the rusty instruments and I would like one of the diamonds, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, here. You can have it. Here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Oh, Percy, why?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that we find out if it's going to be useful. If it's just acid, it won't do a thing to the diamond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about a sapphire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or a sapphire, fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My fine blue sapphire that's been in here for a year and a half. You can have it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Care for some Cold Stone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to mix the acid in. Add some raspberries.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're putting it on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On one of the rusty instruments, and on a sapphire.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's a rusty trombone? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shutting it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shouts) Google will answer that at the break!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't Google it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chatroom, please help out Ashley.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no. Don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you take a dab of it and you place it on the rusty instrument, which actually looks like some weird hooked crowbar-type implement. The rust immediately cleans off and the metal underneath begins to slowly warp and bend and then dissolve at the place where you dripped it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Placing it on the sapphire, it kind of coats it, slips off and begins to burn the ground around the sapphire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Interesting, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good on metal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good on metal, not so good, necessarily on--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On jewels. That's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If the glass is glass, the glass will break. If the glass is something else, we may have to burrow through it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sapphire's okay, then? Is it clean? Does it have any acid still on it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's coming back to me, don't reach for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to clean off the sapphire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clean it off. It looks like there are very, very minor pockmarks across the surface, but yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're good. We're very, very good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the sapphire back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can possibly-- I'll make sure I learn Heat Metal and I can heat the edges of the crossbeam. And then if we can have Grog bring something heavy after we've weakened it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! I think a big weight, once it's been acid-ed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about a giant?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could just jump on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's on the top of the temple, that's what I mean. If you can jump on it, then we'll be going down with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Yeah, that's all right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It will simply just heat it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hot metal bends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've had a lot of success flying around, right? What if, and I don't know who does what, but what if one small group flew in with Tiny in the form of a mouse. And then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dropped him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if you're on the flying carpet dropping him, you get out of there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if cursed giant lands on the metal beam after we've already weakened it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I like that more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that is good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But he could go apeshit on us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no. Not if he's alone up there. What if we do it, do it, do it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Try to weaken it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half the team gets into position on the top of that thing. The other half splits off, drops the giant, the giant goes apeshit for like a minute. Right? Drawing help away from the beholder, drawing attention down there. We wait for a minute, then start pouring acid and Grog smashes it with his fucking forehead.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you levitate or do something to move a giant boulder that we can drop on top of it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Of course I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we recap on your-- You looked in using your magics, and you saw-- Tell us what she told us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we remember? I have advantage to recall information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To one side, there are two large cages that contain what look like some sort of skinless creatures that are currently being experimented on. On the far end of that room, there is a table that was set up with implements. This is probably in the process of what K'Varn has been, just having fun toying with flesh. On the opposite side of the room, it was shrouded in darkness and that was where you saw K'Varn reveal itself out of the shadow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One question. If we break the thing at the top and the upside-down Christmas tree falls into the Elder Brain pool thing, are we going to kill all of the illithids in the city in one fell swoop?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, according to Clarota, it was pretty heavily--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, at this point as you say that, Clarota goes, "That is not an option."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not saying it is, Clarota.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, we're just trying to see if, maybe, we could--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't want it to happen, we just were making sure it wouldn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You mentioned that the Elder Brain was pretty protected from physical damage. That there was lots of magical enchantments and stuff?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Ooh, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is a powerful entity, but it has its limits in its currently weakened form."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. What if you cast Featherfall on it as, right when we did it, and then we can move it out of the way?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Doesn't quite work that way. It works on creatures. I'm not sure I could do this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a terrible idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great, let's hear it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm full of those, but let's hear yours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if we break the fall of the device with Clarota?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Clarota? What about-- Why Clarota?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The giant Tiny?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kima. He means Kima

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm saying, what if we lure it into the center of the room and then drop the ceiling on top of it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you mean--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: K'Varn?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: K'Varn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota is currently stepping back with a look of confusion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a bit tired. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your name is confusing to us. This is why we wanted to call you Clarence. Sorry, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the term 'Clarence', you see the tentacles go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's warming up to it. I think he's liking it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Clarota, how much does the crystal weigh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not know. I was not around when it was created. I didn't know it existed until you saw "it. I have not been in the city in months. Nearly a year."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it is definitely an option, though. If we can lure it out of hiding and get it into the center of the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought the Elder Brain was directly below it, so it would have to step on the Elder Brain in order to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is the Elder Brain directly below it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems too complicated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not one large mind, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a series of-- The way you saw it, it is a cluster of brains that are kind of merged together into one large, hivemind mound.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who wants to go up on top?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who would want to go down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, less a crystal and more a metallic structure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if, instead of letting it fall before we fully break it, we take the rope and rope it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or chain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And chain, and then lift it and then take it away.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Or just swing it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it doesn't fall all the way and it goes at a pendulum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Complicated engineering.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Keyleth, what did the structure look like again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It looks like a beehive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Phantom of the Opera.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's made of metal and glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a slowly, like a spiraling mass of metallic pipes, tubes, metal bands that just slowly twists and comes to a gradual point, like an upside-down Christmas tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So if it falls, it would be bad on the brain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, yes. We can swing it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Many structures like this-- We won't have to, maybe, do any of that. If we could just, merely bend the structure, I believe that would compromise the magical integrity. Usually structures like this are designed for a particular arcane reason. If we were to merely damage it, Grog you could just as you do to most things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you looking to me to bend it. I was like, can you metalbend? This is awesome. But you want me to get my sweet hands on it?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I mean, I could probably help as well, along with Clarota, but that's an option.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do I get to it, though? I mean, if we break--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Flying carpet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I can't. It doesn't carry me.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It would only carry you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could carry a Grog and that's about it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'm back!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you are Randy Quaid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Randy Quaid, which I've always aspired to be. I'm in, I'll do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we 100% certain there's no nooks or crannies, or holes, or anything? We don't want to go have a look?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we should go have a look tomorrow morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go have a look, why? You're just going to get caught.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why? Because-- No, we're not going to get caught.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're assuming we know everything there is to know about this structure. About the city around it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're talking about a chance to gamble with his life. Let's let him do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we should go. We should know all we can know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just wondering what more you're going to find out from a flyby that I couldn't find out from my vision.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I don't know how to tell you the things that you don't know yet, because you don't know them.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on. Vax, are you planning on going alone? That's silly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take this guy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's even more silly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because all his stealth checks lately have been perfect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He can go invisible. We'll just take a peek.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we do it? Should we nap and then you guys go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it. Let's nap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do it. Nap! We nap and rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys take an evening of rest. We'll take this as our break. Our little quick ten-minute break, guys. We'll make it quick so we can get back to this, because we have a lot to try and cram into this evening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: United as one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll see you guys shortly. Wait, do we have a--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I have a quick announcement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: So Malcadale-- Malhadale was the one that sent you guys-- (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Huzzah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He sent me this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grand merci.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That was actually for Matt, and I wasn't going to call it out on screen.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, I'm keeping it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think you should keep it. It has a dragon.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I got in trouble for saying it was yours.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think the mouse is actually-- Keyleth, so the staff--

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm not sure. Those were sent from-- The mouse and the bear were sent by somebody else, so just yell at me in the chatroom and tell me whose that is. Ben Funkinator won the first giveaway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: And we are only like 23 away from another giveaway. And here's the thing, guys, since that next giveaway is at 3,000, which is a huge, huge goal of ours, I'll give away three signed photos and three signed books. Instead of one giveaway, we'll do three giveaways to celebrate 3k. And I have notified some of the troops that we could possibly hit 3k subs, so they are on their way back to dance with us tonight. Some of our people. You guys don't have to stay, but you're more than welcome to, except I was told by Erika that if we hit 3k subs you have to dance Careless Whisper with her. That's what Erika told me, she was like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Without your shirt on.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That has to happen if we hit 3k.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: All right, how many are we away from that?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We're only, like, 23 away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say if we're pushing to go to a dance party after this, since this is maybe a climatic, slightly overtime game, then we got to take a very short break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah yeah. Like five minutes max.

lines.name: MATT, ZAC
lines.text: Five-minute break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See you guys here in a second.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also ale!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As she hiked down the mountain towards Stillben, she meditated on the task ahead. Part of the Aramente is proving yourself a strong warrior, a valiant protector, and a wise and compassionate leader. With this knowledge, one thought plays on repeat in her mind: Is she even worthy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then one night, Percy had a dream. A roaring cloud of smoke offered him vengeance against those who destroyed his family. When he awoke, Percy began to design his first gun. (gunshot)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When he awoke-- [dramatic music]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back!

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Cool. Good game. Good game, bro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we hit 3,000 on the break! (cheering)

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, that's impressive! You guys are awesome! So to enter in the giveaway you just have to be active in the chatroom. It could be as simple as just posting: 'I love Zac, he's great!' That's all you have to write.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or Vex. Whoever.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Just watch the chat room for giveaways! Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Expectantly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I offer him a sip from the cask of ale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it in his hand. Which to him looks like a small mug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, just a sip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's going to drink the whole cask down?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's going to drink the whole cask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He peels the top of it off, breaking the wood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't do this to me. Don't do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gulps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will fucking kill you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shattering noise)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Grog! No no no!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, we'll give you a whole thing of it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's so happy!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Look, Grog! And I cast Prestidigitation and I make fart noises. (fart noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh look! He's farting!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh look, I'm farting!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, start tap dancing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, are you crying?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (grunts) 12!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Should you choose to, you manage to resist the urge to fly into a rage and smash your axe into the face of this entity.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: (makes fart noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bite your lips, you can taste the blood in your mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh Tiberius! Some farts! Look at those farts!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I figured he'd like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run up his fat chest and I headbutt him in the face!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's my cask of ale!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say for this, go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tune in for the beholder fight three weeks from today!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can you check for me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is a natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't fuck with Grog's cask of ale!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Clerics don't lie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh God, that's our giant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's being true to himself.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And he's dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, it might be like a Fomorian thing! He might like it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh God. Can I do something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stunned. (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You owe me a cask of ale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Grog stands over staring down at it, it's only partially reminiscent-- and in your fury you didn't realize that you shouted at it in Giant. It looks up at you and gives you a nod of momentary submission, as you step off of its body onto the ground walking away extremely furious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm grieving now. Leave me be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that happened.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Crisis averted.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go over and pat him on the shoulder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (tearfully) My cask of ale!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay, Grog! I'll get you ten casks of ale!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: TRAVIs: I have allergies down here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I pick up a piece of the cask, I take my wheel out (whizzing noises).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's mending the cask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Mending Wheel continues its process.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've had that cask for two years, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Mending Wheel completely forms it into a pure, untouched, perfect, empty cask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Tiberius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We will fill that cask with ale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's your woobie. You can sleep again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a promise cask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. Woobie it is. Henceforth it shall be called Woobie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good Job, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I was trying to tell you that before you hit the creature, but it worked out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, shall some of us stealth ahead to the temple to see what we can see or should we set out on foot as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! Do you want to do his foot first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was just about to say, does this look normal to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) Oh, come on! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, I've got a lot of flexibility back and it feels stronger, but it doesn't look quite right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks disgusting!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right! All right! Let's do it! So I have to roll medicine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll medicine and what level healing you want to use.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys just rested. Everyone's spells are back at full.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, we just rested. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just keep in mind what spells you want to have prepared, and keep in mind what may be ahead of you. So be sparing, I recommend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, get it out of my face!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's just a foot. Don't go crazy with it, Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to be able to sneak better.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do we know how much is left on-- We don't?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's had advancement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is like the fourth time we've done this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So, 20 for medicine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolled 20 for medicine?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and what level healing spell are you going to use? Just keep in mind the battle you may have ahead of you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. Shit, I don't know what level to do it at. Since we're going to the whole thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it level one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Level one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 1d8 plus five.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mark off a level one spell casting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's almost healed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got a big battle, brother. Shouldn't have fallen asleep in that--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, that, and the medicine check, part of the scarring from the lava burns that still remains, begin to heal over. Most of the scars are gone. You're on the cusp of getting past your disadvantage, but not quite yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, your nubbin lives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, what is the plan? Are some of us setting out on foot or are we just sending--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. The stealthiest of the stealthy go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On foot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no. On the carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the carpet, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. A little recon and then we--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just recon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'm with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go ahead and cast Enhance Ability for dexterity on Scanlan over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gives you advantage on your dexterity checks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it just dexterity you can enhance, or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, we have Scanlan. There we go. Look at these guys here on the new carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's adorable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: New carpet!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's advantage. You get to roll twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you guys hold place. The two of you drift into the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be careful!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just us two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the two of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Farewell, Pike. I'll miss you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sings) Goodbye my love!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? My love?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no. I-- Well, it's from a movie that I saw.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Pike, what is a movie?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a puppet show?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it's just like flashing pictures that all move together.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, like light! Like that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It flashes?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It flashes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, off we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you hop onto the carpet and begin to slowly ride up past the treetops of the nearby fungal forest. As you curve upward into the air--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) I can show you the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, in itself, is essentially a pyramid with a flattened top. There is that dull, greenish glow that seems to just slowly trickle around the very top of the temple. As you are just starting to crest over the top of the outskirts of the city proper, I'd say about here. Are you guys going over the city? Are you following the outskirts? What's your plan of recon? You guys are currently now moving this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plan? What's that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I leave it to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we're moving pretty fast. I say we go all around the rim of the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Both of you roll stealth. With advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, 18. Okay. So, you guys begin to crest around, and you look down and it's very, very dark. There are what looks like these greenish spores that found pockets in the city that give off light. This very, very faint luminescence within the city, and they get thicker and thicker and cluster and make the center of the city more bright and easier to make out the details of. You don't know if these were placed there or if they naturally grew there and just add the ambiance to it. But what you see in that little bit of light as you glance down are many figures walking and moving through the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What figures?

lines.name: MATT, SAM
lines.text: Many figures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you crest around this side, you can see a far ruin about another half mile to a mile off from where you are, too far away to catch any details of it. You cruise around this side, and you hear this squeaking sound, this (squeaks), and you glance up, and you see what looks like a cluster of bats moving to the top of the cavern. They're almost buzzing you guys in the head, up above, ten, 20 feet ahead of you, they're just coming back and forth over you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sentries?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, sentry bats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys take it a little lower to kind of get away from that. Eventually the bats stop harrowing you. You find your way back around. Come to rest back at the camp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And just to clarify, the part where we saw all the illithid figures was on the opposite side, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was around this section, here. You saw, in this portion of the city, which is the only one example. The best you can see around this, this whole intersection right around the temple is pretty fairly populated with mind flayers and their slaves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (voice breaks) So the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Puberty's a bitch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (voice breaks) Yes. Well, I'm only 62.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need that big brain on our side?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But more on the northern edge, not so much here on the side. And it's a lot. It's not a few, it's a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a city. We need the Elder Brain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need a distraction, though. That's the only thing I took away from what we saw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless we all go in from the top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tiny and I had a meeting of the minds. We could provide a distraction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You wanna go against illithid?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't give a shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He does not want to go against illithid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chaotic Neutral, baby!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but they're going to take you over, big guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They'll take you over and then we'll fight you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here's what I think is better. We take Tiny, transform him into a mouse. We fly over, just when we're over the right part of the city, flick him in the mouse nuts, and toss him off. And then let him turn him back into Tiny, as he falls into a pile of illithid and keeps them busy. We need to draw as much attention away from the beholder as possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What will we be doing in the meantime?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be going in over the top, trying to get rid of the thing controlling the Elder Brain.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We do not want that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there's going to be collateral damage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I like the first half of that idea, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The nut-flicking part?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Whoever-- I guess we make the effort to go in, however we can manage, to get into the top of wherever we are going to attack those beams, as it were, to do damage to the thing controlling whatever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's when we should lightly drop him in as a mouse. Because when this takes enough damage, which he should, as a mouse, the spell will wear off. And he would poof back into whatever. We should do it right on the beholder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, I agree with that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because that, I think, would be more a distraction for the creature. A beast against a nasty beast is always a good fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If he's being controlled by you, can he not be controlled by another being?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It probably would be a contest of wills.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he could turn the thing on us pretty easily, I'm willing to believe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, what if we-- How about this, why don't we turn him into a mouse and we can just keep him as our, you know, emergency pocket mouse, and whenever, if we need a quick distraction, then we flick him in his mouse nuts and drop him over and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: His poor mouse nuts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And we will have disadvantages.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't want to go in.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you got one?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Even the slaves will rally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They don't like Clarota. They aren't going to listen to Clarota, especially if they're controlled by another being.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they did exile him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota puts the thought in your mind immediately, basically, this very strong realization that, "Without the town freed, I have no leverage with my people."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what I'm saying. After we've destroyed the mechanism.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, that's the plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: After we've destroyed the mechanism, yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right. That's why we cannot attack the town.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So are we saying we want to go up to the top, we want to try and weaken the cross with the yellow and the acid, we want to drop Titmouse, the giant, on the thing, hopefully, if it breaks. If it doesn't break, then what do we do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And also, I don't understand, we're talking about crashing the thing. But aren't we risking, at least, risking dropping the upside-down pyramid onto the Elder Brain?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's why I was saying if we can--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to tie a chain to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think if we tie a chain to it, I think we break the beams and then air-evac it out, personally.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it might be too heavy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Evacuate it via air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like that uses way more time because what's going to happen is once it happens, it's all going to go to shit. So once we drop it, we should probably just fucking go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well then, how about this? Why don't we concentrate, instead of-- Because okay, it's a middle cross beam thing, right? Why don't, instead of focusing on the middle section, we focus just on two sides, so it goes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I throw a wrinkle into things? Those bats didn't look good. Those are eyes that he's using to watch things above. So we gotta get through the bats first. Or distract the bats, or get rid of the bats.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Bats will be a problem. Bats catch fire rather quickly, if I recall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe, Keyleth, you could turn into a bat and tell them all to go a different direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can talk to the bats or I can Dominate a bat. I could talk to the bats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is assuming the bats are going to be a problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If it comes up, we'll deal with it. How about that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll make sure I can talk to the bats.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not afraid of bats.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no no. The bats will ruin our element of surprise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: None of this is a surprise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have, really, an element of surprise at this point?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: None of it's a surprise. He knows we're here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Onward, ho?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Onward, ho.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't even know what we're doing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quit tip-toeing into the ocean, let's run into this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grasps it in her hands, her armor freshly polished after waking up this morning. Looks at the rest of you and says, "Are you ready to walk into the great halls of the warrior minds before us?"

lines.name: ORION, MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have any ideas, real quick. Or were you hearing anything we were saying? Kima? I just mean there's a lot of ideas thrown out, but do you have any idea, specifically?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have anything to contribute?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Improvisation scares me."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So everything we can possibly do to maintain a very quiet arrival is going to be the "key to success in this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So that's either a distraction or taking care of bats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I could Fog Cloud us. We could look like a big, floating cloud.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but if we float, then we're going to float right through the fog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we use a giant net and two of us get up on the carpet and we use a big net and catch as many bats as we can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Does anyone have a net?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have a net?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have a giant piece of leather that makes us look like rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog had Annette, back in Emon. She was great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I still think we should drop Tiny on top of the-- or at least, near the main illithid encampment to keep them busy. K'Varn's eye will turn there for a moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can-- And we can attach the camouflage back onto the flying carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have camouflage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota motions for a second and says, "We also have to consider this temple has doorways in "and out. This chamber that K'Varn has taken has ways to be opened and outside forces in. Do we "have a way to seal these entrances if we are to do this fight, so we don't have any additional "visitors?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good call. Great. Do you know where those entrances are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: K'Varn thinks for a second and says--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your name's Clarota. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are, if I recall, two doors to the room. Not large."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He doesn't need doors, right? He can make portals and shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no. He'll need a door to let in other people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, here's the thing are we trying to actually-- We're not trying to get inside the temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're trying to keep him from calling in a fucking dragon or something. He can't Dimension Door in a dragon and be like, "Just kidding."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can call every single creature in the city to come to his aid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But he can't--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More than enough to deal with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not if you damage the device."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can just drop things in from above on the temple and stay out of the temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If the device is damaged, he no longer has sway over the illithid."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So then we want people to come into the temple at that point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, that's when we get out and smoke him out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not going to set him on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe just give up on the smoking out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think hotboxing is now-- No?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If I were to use Divination soon, how long does that last?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Divination.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that the one where you call your deity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you mean Divine Inspiration?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Divine Inspiration, I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That happens the moment you use it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It happens the moment you use it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we would know if she's going to help us? Or would she help us that moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not so much, "Hey god, come with me." It's more like, "Please help me right now." Something may happen that turns the tide.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So is that something, just a question, that I would do now or maybe in the battle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe in the battle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, the moment you need the help is the moment it will happen, most likely.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, I'm back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we-- Before we make this journey, can we sound off who's on what duty?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's on damaging-the-device duty, who's on--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could give the four acid vials to whoever has the yellow liquid who wants that responsibility.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like we should use some of that, though, for the beholder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to save as much of it for the beholder as possible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The yellow liquid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So who wants to pour the acid on the cross? I could do that, but it's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy-- Well, are you going up top?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at everybody's disposal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head up top. Also, in the fight, I'll be more use from a distance anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's on the shutting-off-those-doors duty? Is that a thing that we need to assign to someone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could you fashion--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That could be Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- like a paintball?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That could be you, but you're not going to be there. You'll still stay behind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you guys, could you guys be in charge of closing up the entrances?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have any spare glass vials?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I have one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I give him a glass vial.

lines.name: MARISHA
