lines.text: Well, I'm flying people overtop, I'm assuming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I have a spare arrow? Vex?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think we should try and separate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I borrow a spare arrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A sparrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A sparrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here you are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a second, I want to see if I can make a crude acid arrow out of a glass vial.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take it, give it to me after it's done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a Shatter, a straight up Shatter arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of the rushed nature of this, go ahead and make a roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a Proficiency bonus, plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will inspire him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Everything is awesome!

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: (sings) Everything is cool when you're making an arrow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d10, add it to the roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, thank you. Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine? As you're attempting to fashion it to the arrow, unfortunately, the vial shatters in your hand. You take three points of acid damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ow. I wasn't-- Aw, I wouldn't have put the acid in yet. Okay, fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It happens at the process of you setting it up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on the roll you made.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having bad rolls for this stuff, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Better to get them out of the way now, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that didn't work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it. Good try. Good try, Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to figure out a way we could just conserve the acid, like if I could--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to pour very gingerly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to just pay attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, try it gingerly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And when he attacks us, what do we do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yes. Good-- Good thinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to fight him now or are we going to try and run? Are we going to try and lure our way--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stay up top as long as possible?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If you're talking about fighting K'Varn in his lair, when he attacks you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not going into-- What if we can just attack from the roof? From the opening in the roof.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your plan is to lead the charge into K'Varn's lair. That's what you're saying. Do I have that correctly? (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Absolutely not, Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that possible? Can we attack from the roof, from the opening in the ceiling? Can we attack him from up there? We don't have to go in.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Possibly, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima gives a nod to that and is like, "I'm useless at that range, but we have a few members "of the party that excel at that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we drop the thing, attack from above as long as possible, and hope the illithid attack him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry. One last question. So his eye cancels out magic, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So the more places we make him look, the more of a chance we have to get it away from the magic users, right?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So instead of just two people, why don't we do all three? If there are two doors, and the skylight, why don't we have three teams so he has to pick which one he looks at?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody go in the temple, everybody attack from outside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I can take one of the doors at the bottom and try and keep people from coming in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a really-- That's a really good idea, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you had two parties to enter the two other doors, they would have to go through the entire "subfloor, find a way up, which you're welcome to try, but who knows."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That would be the best-case scenario.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, traditionally, that's very similar to how pyramids are built.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, what else were you going to say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was all Clarota had to add to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a good thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could still take a similar approach and just have-- We've already decided we're going to have two teams to be on two separate ends to do the slidey-- The hingey maneuver. And then have a third team that's K'Varn distraction duty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we do distraction duty? Maybe people who have really high--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So this is the beam. And we're going to attack this one and this one, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, so if--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're effed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we've got this pyramid. And there's this cross beam, you said, right Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, is it like that? Oh god, I'm picturing it so fucking different.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And there's this top of it, which is open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So this is the pyramid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can see. And then the thing is, if you can see through it, the thing is hanging down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it looks, it's all spirally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then here is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Elder Brain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Elder Brain.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And where's beholder-face?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Somewhere in here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're going for one side of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So if we go for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it hopefully goes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to keep breaking-- I'm just going to keep breaking hinges until it swings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is anybody interested in going underneath the pyramid with me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You? Technically, you could really go underneath it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like you'll be fighting a lot more things. I think it's better to just go from the top, and drop in if we have to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Drop in if we have to and, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And just scatter to different areas so he has to look around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep him looking around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can't stay together.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And remember that, if you don't use magic, and especially you have one magic attack, don't try and use magic when the main eye is on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No no. Yeah. Butthole only.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. Are we going up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's. I think we should try this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, okay okay, hang on. What happens if this starts going poorly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which it's bound to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We run away.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Actually, if everything starts going amiss, I will make the call. Follow me and I will get out of here as soon as possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How will we follow you if you're on a carpet and we're standing on a thing, and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or if you're dead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're all in different places.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: If I'm dead, then I'm afraid none of you will survive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But if we're all around the room, let's say we've got in there and it's fallen off and we're all around the thing. You can't all whip us out of there. We have to be in one area, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We all have to be in one area.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We have to be on the carpet? Is that a carpet joke?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No no no. I was asking, you can't teleport a room out, we have to be together, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I can make a portal that we can all step in and bamf to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we have to be near you, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We have to be where I cast it, yes. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So if he makes the portal, you have to get to the portal.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We might not have that luxury.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We might not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we have a safe location?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we have a run-away word, a safety word, like Oklahoma, or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How about "Oh god, we're all going to die. Run away, run away right now. My god, my god, "we're all going to die"?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, Percy, yes. I believe it's this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we'll do this.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll do the signal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to clarify.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before we go. I am dropping a giant mouse in there, right?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Going up on a Thursday!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Okay, so, are we doing it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, let's go have some fun!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's just sitting here, laughing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima lobs her maul on her shoulder and gives you a look and says, "Yes, this day we save "Kraghammer, Cliffkeep Mountains, and quite possibly, the future of Tal'Dorei. But if we fall, "others will come to try and finish our journey."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good pep talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Either way, we do this as heroes, we do this together, for Vox Machina."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She puts her hand out in the center.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Kima. Clarota, are you going to put your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota slowly hovers towards the center.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Clarota.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These terrible, long, lanky fingers almost wrap around the cluster of hands at the top. Cold and nasty. Trinket comes up and nuzzles in the center.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima, once more, says, "For Vox Machina!"

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Vox Machina!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're a well-oiled machine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go do the stupidest thing we've ever done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, what are you thinking over there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we getting there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, one problem is-- We're still coming in--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I know. We're all still coming in through one area, though. It's like the fatal funnel. It's like a doorway. If you all come in through the doorway, you're all in one spot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's also an easy way out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It worked for the Spartans in that awesome 300 comic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all bad. It's all bad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dick-finger eyes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up. It was awesome in the comic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what is the process, here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is the plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Question. When you guys were flying overhead, the top of the temple is wide enough for us to stand on, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got a massive cross beam supporting a giant arch structure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about, I'd say, 20 foot by 20 foot.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's a pretty wide square. Enough for all you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we stand on the wall of the temple?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, there's like a five-foot wall on the edge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have one more plan, just to throw it out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm all ears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just occurred to me. It just occurred to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could get us into the temple a different way, but not into the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could make us all look like illithids.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're psychic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He'll read our minds. He's already in our heads.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could read our minds but we'll be outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota turns to you slowly and says, piercing in your mind with a force of honesty and almost condescending essence, "You will make it ten feet before the "brain is pulled from your skull."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So that's a no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, all right. Good, then let's just go divebomb with a big mouse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I-- All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This. Is. Vox Machina!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have a thousand-foot Teleport.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Fomorian stands up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, for ground forces we do have a thousand-foot Teleport. So we could actually bring you into the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it gets to a point where we want to go in, I will go in underneath with you. I'll do my earth elemental thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, anything that'll just split up where he looks. That's all I wanna do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go with you if it gets to that point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Fomorian stands up with his club and looks to you and says, in Undercommon, "What do "you need?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we telling the-- Hey, hey! What are we telling the giant to do? Knock the cross or attack K'Varn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Attack the beholder when it's dropped there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, right now, you are going to be mouse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good, good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You kill beholder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat. Food. Big eyeball.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eat food. Yes, delicacy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." (grunts) Like slams his chest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: There he is!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, Tiny, you're tiny!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most confused-looking mouse you've ever seen. If there could be an expression of, "What "the fuck?" on a mouse, it's on that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He still smells really, really bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's throwing-- Who's throwing him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'll just keep him with me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I scratch him behind his ears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's on the carpet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The way we always do it, don't we? Don't the gnomes fly--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bird-style.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How does Grog get anywhere? I forget.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going to Polymorph Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No no. You Levitate me, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I cast Fly on him and I hop on his back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This time you can see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This should be a lot smoother.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so Percy, Vex, Vax on the flying carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be on the carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Us too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket can't be on the carpet. Trinket's too heavy for the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can anybody shrink Trinket, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Trinket worth it? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan. Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's just a limited number of spells.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh no he didn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course Trinket is worth it. I was saying-- I was being Bizarro Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Who can shrink my bear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, are you hawk, carrying the gnomes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we're all magic carpeting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we can't all fit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can fit six people on the carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is what we always do. You carry the gnomes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you cast Fly on Trinket and ride him? I'll ride him, if somebody casts Fly on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we-- Here's the thing. If I turn into a hawk, I won't be able to turn into an earth elemental.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't want to sacrifice that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we-- Is it possible to drop off a group and then go back and get the rest? A taxi?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, why not? Can we make two trips?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have two carpets, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't work that way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I tried.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was such a good try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have-- We have two carpets. Two carpets.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have two carpets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to make two trips and come back for seconds. Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Two trips, wait what? Why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, first shift is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The stealthiest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can't do anything for us up here. She has no ranged attacks, she's useless. In a sexy way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not a compliment, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima looks you dead in the face and says, "Regardless of what your plans are, I'm bringing "this hammer onto the head of that foul abomination."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, she means it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, of course, but outside, here with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know I will not survive this. But I will be damned if I don't dent its face before I go."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is why we're picking you up in the second group.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And, Lady Kima, you must survive. Because you must tell Allura of my deeds. For no particular reason.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's not like you'll be there to collect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Noted."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the, you know, props. If you die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Second trip. First, be quiet."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Stealth, stealth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stealth people first.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stealthy should go first, and that's not me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we'll fly the carpet back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You promise you'll take care of Trinket if I go--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. So we'll fly. And then we'll fly the carpet back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can Trinket go in a smaller group? He'll fit on the carpet if there's a smaller group?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Too heavy, unfortunately. It's a big bear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's he going to get from the top of the pyramid down in? Maybe he should hide here and live to tell our story.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's going to drop me off on the first trip, take Fly off of me, he'll get on the carpet, come back for the second group, and Fly Trinket.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, you'll keep Fly up. Because I can just hop on the carpet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I mean, once I'm up on the temple, you take it off of me. And then you can put it on Trinket, because I'll be chilling on the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that's casting it twice.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm casting it twice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which you can't do?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: But Trinket can get on the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he can't ride the carpet, we just said that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trinket should stay with the boat as opposed to fighting the beholder.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: He needs a diet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those are your options, is Trinket fights a beholder, or Trinket stays.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're having this discussion, Trinket comes over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rubs his nose along you, and gives you a look of, like a very stern stance of, essentially, the feeling is Trinket wants to be by your side for this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Trinket wants to be by my side, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How the fuck do we get him up there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, who's on the first carpet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone's burning a spell, or we're going in shifts. One of the two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are doing shifts, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't need to if we burn a spell, because Trinket's the one that can't fit on the carpet in the first place. Everybody else can fit on, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Polymorphing Trinket--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait a minute, hold on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we're casting Fly on him.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hold on a tick. How much can you lift, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I weight 645 pounds, so a lot.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So a shit-ton.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is not strong enough to carry a bear and you on a Fly spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we cast Fly on the bear?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No no no. I mean one at a time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a good idea, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're still doing shifts then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try. There's a good chance he might drop Trinket on the way over. From that height, which would be a splatter bear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you cast Fly on Trinket and then have Grog ride Trinket?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the same issue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that the same problem?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if one of us ride Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, but Grog won't fit on the flying carpet. This is a really-- This is like a mind puzzle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How long does it take to make the trip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From flying over there on the carpet, at its full speed--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan and I flew over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it'd take about 20 minutes or so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 minutes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To fly a mile?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 minutes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I cast Fly on Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The carpet isn't extremely fast.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, wait. And I'll do that. I'll wait, because I can only do it one at a time. So I'll burn it for him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what did you do?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll burn it for Trinket. The Fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we can both Fly?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we can all Fly?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not right now. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: We'll go up first, then I'll come back down with the carpet, I'll cast Fly on him and whoever is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, first batch. Vex, Vax, Percy, Scanlan, Grog is flying. All right. Grog's there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're staying?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll stay down with Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who else can go, is there room for one more?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because I don't need to go up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what are Kima and Clarota--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're hanging out with Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, we'll say Clarota will go with you guys because Clarota can stealth. Kima will stay back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on the entire party, before we all take off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. All right. As you guys all continue forward. Let's see. Keyleth, are you going with them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I stay behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to, in front of us, using Minor Illusion, I'm just going to create a floating bald eagle thing to distract the bats with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just flying around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota goes invisible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the bonus for Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth isn't dexterity, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm? Yes it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you add ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You add ten to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, plus ten?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 total? All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys make your way--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He rolled three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- over to the temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The bats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bats don't seem to take any notice of your passage. You find your way slowly coming towards the temple. That dull, eerie green glow towards the top. The carpet finds its way just along the edge to the point where you can safely step off on that little five-foot-wide section of walkway that surrounds the glass top. And you do see it. It is a relatively large, see-through, almost glass-like substance. It's hard to say. It looks like glass. It's about a good three inches thick, and the metal beams themselves are bolted into the stone itself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're bolted into the stone itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would love to, while we're here, very quietly examine--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, when we've arrived, is anyone going back? No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, people were dropping people off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone's going back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's going back?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm staying on the carpet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So he's going back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you're going back to pick up the others?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Grog slowly flies over and meets up with you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you stayed back.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, I had to go with you so I could take the carpet back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's enough room now, for the carpet to go back and take all of us?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So I can come back with the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Because they're dropped off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so you dropped us off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you roll a stealth check?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you guys are left at that point, now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to see where it would be weakest, mathematically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually no, this would be investigate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Investigate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Before I leave to go back down, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: When you see it, be sure to mark the beast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You gather, best that you can, that the metal itself is essentially bolted overtop onto the stone. If you were to run the acid along where the metal is overlapping and bolted down on the top, that would weaken it significantly. The stone itself is not going to help much, but where that boundary is, where it's essentially clamped, that area right there is going to be where you want it to put a bleed through and coat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, are you going back for the others? All right. Are you guys just standing carefully on the edge?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we waiting?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are definitely staying out of any kind of visible sight of the giant meatball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. Tiberius, you head back?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Eventually grabbing the rest of the group here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go ahead and cast Pass Without a Trace on the rest of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Fly on Trinket. Which is a hilarious sight. As this large, brown, armored bear, all of a sudden is like (confused bear noise). It takes a good--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Go to Vex. She's up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say that, Trinket, suddenly, straightens trajectory a little bit and starts finding this awkward zig-zag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But nevertheless is finding some sort of purchase in this strange, flying environment. You can see, if a bear could have an expression, it'd be bewilderment, confusion, and slowly trickling into joy.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's very cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so cute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm flying!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all begin to drift back over towards the center of the city, if I can get a stealth check from everybody, including Trinket.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And we get a plus ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus ten. Everybody on the second trip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And for Trinket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, um, yeah, that's--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus ten? 16.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, plus ten would be 11 because he rolled a one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I saw it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I'm flying!"

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's your first time. It's going to be a little rough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Trinket continues floating behind the carpet, you hear this familiar (bat squeaks)--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 60 feet back.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How far away is it from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 60 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn, and I, seeing the bats come in, in bat language, in like, you know, echo (bat noises).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The bats say, "What are you clicking at us?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Echolocation. I tell the bats, don't worry about it. Go home.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nothing to see here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Forget about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Forget about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're running an errand for K'Varn. Don't worry about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Persuade those bats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Inspiration, Inspiration!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not with her. I don't even know this is going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't matter what you roll, you can't persuade bats. They're bats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, but I had a good roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, but you can't persuade bats.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I had a good roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can't persuade bats.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I thought you said roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was just fucking with her.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Speak with Animals. That's what I cast. It was a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I said I do this. I cast Speak with Animals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I somehow missed that phrase or that never came up in the conversation. Anybody else hear Speak with Animals as a spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I heard her say, "I cast--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was looking at the page.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I missed that. Okay, so.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I think you said, "I cast Talk to Bats."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what was your persuasion roll, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. I somehow missed the spell. This was a really funny moment of Keyleth in my head, I was like, "What is-- Okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go home.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all start going, "Go home, bats."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seem to shudder in place as you're giving off this strange series of squeaks and echo-based sounds. And they seem briefly rattled. As opposed to going away, they just stay in place as you guys drift further and further away.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Hmm, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know what that means, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not getting chased. Eventually you guys come down. You're now landing around the outskirts of this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He could be watching us, for all we know.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I stay on the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You stay on the carpet, all right. So.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we're so finished.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing? While they were off, what were you doing, there, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was examining and I've got four vials of acid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got the three that we had, and then I've got the fourth, super-- That's a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's really distracting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's an omen of things to come.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hope so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who has the mouse, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have the mouse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, I'm going to start by taking our normal vials of acid and I'm going to pour very gingerly right at the sections I want to crack and start letting it burn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While we're standing there, I pull out an arrow and I'm tying the little tiny mouse onto an arrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I also pull out my climbing equipment and my 200 feet of rope out of the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And start putting the climbing gear on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he get double Pass without a Trace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take-- No.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are there any jutting stone things, anywhere around? It's just flat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's smooth, stone surface surrounding this glass top. Percy, as you've placed the acid around the two sides, you kind of slowly move around and trickled along where the metal beams reach the stone. The acid is having an effect, but it's a very slow--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take the major bottle of acid, and I'm just going to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before he does, can I-- I'm going to just see if there's any magic protecting these-- the metal or the joints.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arcana check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I should do it, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there is a magical aura to the metal itself. It does not seem to be protective in nature. It is more of a, best you can tell, a transmutation-based magic. Probably something that is directly affiliated with how-- The effect it's having on the Elder Brain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, do you want to work on one beam and I can maybe do a focused soldering on the other?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can anybody cast Dispel Magic?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it doesn't seem like the magic is protecting the metal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to just, I'm going to get the more intense acid. I'm going to just-- I'm just going to use the tiniest bit. I want to maintain as much as I can. I want to start working on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the actual metal material also balances the acid with a little bit. So essentially, you begin carving into it, but the little bit you use doesn't keep burning through it. Burns to a certain point, and then just loses its acidity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to keep gingerly slicing it through, until it's just being held. The minute it starts to give, I'm going to shift to the next one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way about halfway through the vial before that one platform you feel is about halfway or more dissolved through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm going to take the other half and I'm going to work on the other--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any purchase? Like, can a hand grip the metal pole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's built in a way that's almost smooth entirely of the top. Like, the construction--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29? Okay. So you empty the rest of the yellow vial on the other side. You can see the actual metal-- The area where you dip it, the kind of yellowish liquid hits this, kind of, smooth shiny bronze color and the leftover material is this, like, thick, horrible dark green color the way the two mix and dissolve. You empty the last of the vial and the other beam gets about halfway dissolved through before eventually the last of it's used up.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: As I do this, I go to the Bag of Holding, and I go to the Endless Rope--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She has that, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have that.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not with us. You stayed on the carpet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's right there, though. Flying next to us.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And, the Endless Rope? As I'm asking for that, I take out my Immovable Rod and I'm going to place it, kind of, in an exit position and (clicks)! Make it stay right above there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As he releases it, this rod is now stuck in mid-air, anchored permanently until removed by a click in that position.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I start flipping through the rope so it goes-- The whole time, I'm just doing that so it goes all the way down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispers) Grog, Grog! We're going to need a lever. We're going to need-- Wrench. Get a blade into the metal, into the iron.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And wrench. And you're going to get the second one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it should give.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. You've dissolved a portion of the two metal beams on each side. You guys have a mouse, kind of tied to an arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's secure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the plan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take one side. And Grog's going to take the other beam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And do what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to start-- I'm going to take my staff and I do a concentrated Heat Metal spell, and I'm just going to kind of solder right along the inside where it's already weakened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You understand the spell Heat Metal is less of a localized damaging the metal. What it does is just causes a metal structure to, in itself, become hot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not like a blowtorch or anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well then, why don't I'll heat the metal while Grog is prying it to help?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It could also hurt Grog if he's touching it if it's that hot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got a wooden handle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's using like a crowbar. Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Using an axe, I'd imagine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well we'll tag team it, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're attempting to pop?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to stick down, and just pull.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Loud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we just give old mousey here-- Turn him into a giant again and drop him right on it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not weakened enough yet, is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not weakened. We're going to - We have to crack it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima looks there and says, "At a certain height, I imagine it would work."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but we want to save him. Let's see if we can do this, first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, yeah. Let's-- This is not going to be loud. Well, it will be loud once it breaks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We get him in place and then try it, and if it makes a noise, we just drop him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got him notched on the arrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shoot him up, and have him come down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we can have Tiberius hit him with, like, a quick damaging spell and make him--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can fly up and just drop him down like a big, giant bomb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need him to fall, like King Kong from the Empire State building.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can take him up up up, and just drop him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we do have a flying carpet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much does he weigh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Fomorian, you imagine, probably weighs, oof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A ton?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say three to five tons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That'll break it. (laughs).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, why don't we weaken the beams first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say about three tons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we-- If we give ourselves away, what do we lose? A lot? I don't think it's worth it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's drop a-- Let's drop a giant bomb on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we'll give away-- So if, like, we try and weaken and the metal makes any noise, anything, right? Jig's up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well it's good-- jig's going to be up as soon as a giant--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, at least it's going through. Like, we won't have even gotten through--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what if it doesn't bust all the way through until we start popping some of the beams?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't-- I think dropping three tons on him is going have much more--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And even if it doesn't, it might be better than trying to crank it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a three-inch-thick piece of pane and steel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do-- Would I have gotten enough engineering information about it to actually have a good sense on whether or not three to five tons would actually do anything at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another investigation? 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the sections of the beams that you've damaged, the thickness of the plane and the metal bars, the part where they attached-- You're not getting a full view, 'cause you're not actually looking in the room yet. Everyone's avoided looking in the room at this point. But you gather, with enough speed and enough weight, this thing would break and hinge pretty easily.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, let's go for it. I'm going to-- I'm just going to show where I want him to drop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we bring him up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the point. Take him all the way up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I go ahead and heat the metal, just in case, for added stuff? I mean, that's quiet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, why not? Wouldn't hurt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I just say, I have no idea what's about to happen, but it's been a great pleasure to walk beside each and every one of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you doing the, "It's been an honor to serve with you, sir"?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would you say that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Screw you. I want my final words with you to be indignant and irritated.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I agree. I think that's poppycock. We'll be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll apologize later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, who's flying the mouse up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius, me and you?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes. Come up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we're going to drop him as a full three-ton weight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm Polymorphing him. I'll make him drop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We weakened only one side, so hopefully it'll only smash one side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'll just fall in? It won't go straight down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can even try and aim him leaning towards our side more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll aim him towards the part that will break.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just shoot him wherever we need him to drop, and (pfft).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we want him to be weight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the three tons, so we want him to be a giant when he falls.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, 'cause he's fat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we execute Manhattan Project?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, let's do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fly it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) It's been an honor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We die with honor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Tiberius on the carpet?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I'm already just going to start crying.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes, I'll take the mouse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And for a second, it's adorable until the smell hits you. You all sit around the edge, like, keeping out of view. You can see a little bit of faint light coming through the glass.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Throw me the mouse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the general green glow that permeates the circumstance. Tiberius slowly lifts up--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start heating the metal beams, concentrating from both sides.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you get overhead, Tiberius, you get the first look into this room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cages of bad guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, experimentees.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the suck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think I just caked my pants a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think Matt had things printed in a 3D printer for this, so it's pretty, pretty cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We gotta get the prisoners to try and help us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're the things we've been fighting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're stitch monsters, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, they're a question mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They might be controlled-by-K'Varn stitch monsters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glance down inside, you see immediately in the center of the room, the giant brass structure coming to a point above the Elder Brain in the center of the room on the elevated platforms. You see there are two caged sections of the room that contain two, kind of, flesh, skinless, altered creatures that have been subjected to serious tortures by K'Varn. K'Varn floats off in the distance by what looks like some sort of experimentation table containing glass vials and strange, metallic structures.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: DM, which side has the crew worked on relative to where I am looking at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here, but first we are gonna go ahead and find--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Did they damage this side or this side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) We are so high up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't-- I don't want to. I just don't want to do it, I am so scared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so everyone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have already died. I know how it feels.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're good.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Use the boots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I won't let you die, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I won't let you guys die. I am on it, I am on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to try very hard not to die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Die with hilarity or die not at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say the group is for the most part up here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not me, I am chilling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a flying bear up here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a crazy roof party.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: So then they've been working on this side, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are working on this side. It would essentially hinge this way.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: This way, wonderful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, drop it, drop it like it's hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glide up, Tiberius, far above, looking down into this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before it falls, I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is there any other preparatory spells that want to be cast at this moment? You wanna give Inspiration to people? Do you wanna cast any spells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see him? Can I go ahead and cast Hunter's Mark on him right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are welcome to look over into the glass if you'd like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cast Inspiration on this gentleman for his throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that's a d10. You can do that up to four people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d10 inspiration die for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me? Oh, for Pike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, d10 for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Either an attack, a saving throw-- I'd recommend saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get Inspiration.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's an inspiration dice to you and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A d10. And Vax, Vax, a d10 inspiration to you as well. Keep track of those guys. These are the only ones you get from the bard this game, because he used them up front. Buff spells that want to be cast at this point in time?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am clicking my Boots of Haste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) And so I come to you with Inspiration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, any buff spells you wanna put on?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am gonna cast Death Ward on Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, is Grog the only one you want to cast it on?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can cast it on more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's not concentration. As many fourth-level spell as you have, you can cast it on different people. It lasts for eight hours.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So how many people can I cast it on if I cast it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As many 4th-level spells as you have. It's one person per cast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am gonna go ahead and cast Stoneskin on myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So Death Ward, if you go down to zero, it will put you at a one, it won't take you under?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Right before things happen, I'll cast Blur.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Blur on yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I cast Stoneskin on myself

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anybody else want Death Ward?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am gonna cast Death Ward on Grog and on Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex or Vax?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, okay, so Death Ward. Mark that Death Ward on both you guys. Keep that in mind. I am not gonna keep track of that for you. It means next time you go to zero hit points it brings you to one, then it's gone. All right, guys. You cast Blur on yourself, hold out the mouse, aim.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I going to aim and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Un-Polymorph him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When he falls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right as he lets him go. We need the mass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelps) Un-Polymorph!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as the mouse descends out of the middle of the air, the Fomorian goes tumbling down, angrily cascading towards it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a falling giant.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we have anything that is gonna stop us from falling towards our death?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: We're on the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a deafening crash sound, the Fomorian goes slamming into the glass. You hear the cracking and crashing sound of the planes as they shatter. The metal structure-- this horrible breaking, bending sound as they bend inward and slam the inside of the temple. The Fomorian, who's streaking down, slams into the ground from that height, taking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The German judge doesn't like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that height, he is dead, even at his hit point level, he is right there on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But because he is enchanted he can still attack, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we splattered a giant, you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, is he dead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah. He's meat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as that happens, the entire structure tilts to the side. Part of it bends and kinda hits the side of the temple, and whatever strange green glow was at the top of the temple dissipates.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we should just go?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I swoop down and pick everybody up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pick who up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not me, you don't pick me up. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You're way up here right now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I know, I'm going to start to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Start making your way down. All right, everyone roll initiative, because K'Varn turns around immediately, and you hear this very familiar, deep voice echoing from within the chamber: "Naughty, naughty. I left the door open for you!" Everyone roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What'd he say? I left the door open for you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He wanted us to come in through the bottom, probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we can hide over the edge so he can't see us, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck, balls, tits, ass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Go ahead and-- We have 25 to 20, guys?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we leaving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 15 to ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, what'd you get?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, seven.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why are you "oh man"-ing? Is that a good "oh man" or a bad "oh man"?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a "he attacks first."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was-- No no, that was a "Kima going last."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Everyone use the rope. It's time to leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog, you're up first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's behind-- Can I see who's behind me in initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. It's your turn. Most everyone's behind you, technically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, with the climbing harness and the rope, I speed-rope into the room and take cover behind the pool. Can I hide behind the pool on the opposite side of-- Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you land there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Opposite of him so I can, like, hide behind the pool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Kind of swing around, you end up in that area there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Like, even going prone if I have to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're-- Ugh, it's hard to hide you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the giant? Can you hide behind the giant splatter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's already landed. So that's your movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've landed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The strange sense of joy and playfulness. It's awful to behold. That's all you're doing your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, can I bury my face in my arms like this, on the ground? Like this? It's like, face down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are coming down as fast as you can on the carpet?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get about halfway to the top of the temple with your turn.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait, that's all I can do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's using your whole round to just fly down with the carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to-- I'm hasted, I'm going to throw three daggers down at him from here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At this distance, you are at disadvantage on the attacks, 'cause it's too far away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so for each attack, too. So where's my-- Okay, that misses-- Well, five. That's a 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And the last one, I'm just going to roll it now, is a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So the-- I'm hitting him with poison dagger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that do something with an Assassin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, advantage, well, advantage on attack rolls on enemies who haven't taken a turn yet. Any hit on-- is a crit. Any hit on a surprise is a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, yeah, it's not a surprise. You kind of blew the surprise with the giant Fomorian crashing through the top. So you have one dagger that hit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep, a poison dagger, which gets three-- is nine, plus poison with a DC of 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right. He is currently poisoned.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, he takes eight plus ten points of poison damage. On top of the dagger damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love how nobody's saying shit, 'cause we're all terrified.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Every roll counts. Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Hunter's Mark is on K'Varn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, good. So, his eye would cancel out my Hail of Thorns attack? Is that considered, like, one--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's looking at me, he's looking at me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, that's true. Okay, then I'm going to cast Hail of Thorns on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you pull your arrow, your hands shaking slightly as you see this creature now focusing its attention on Grog below. You pull out the arrow, you focus your magical energy. The shaft of the arrow, you know, juts out all these different thorns and you release it below. Go ahead and roll your attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Okay, that's 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you doing a secondary attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your secondary attack now, just to get it out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. The secondary attack I wanted to shoot through my Bloodseeking Bow, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's probably not going to hit. That's a 13.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I give a plus ten? War God's Blessing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage for both.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I'm casting-- it's a 3rd-level spell on Hail of Thorns. Ah! Where's my d10s? Okay, I'm so nervous. I don't-- I can't find anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a d10.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. There's a d10, there's a d10. Okay, so ten on that, plus Hunter's Mark. Six, so 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the first attack. And the second one-- 14.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's so quiet in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I know. 14. Oh wait, I get plus two on that other attack, whatever it was, it was--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The damage, right. 18. Okay. Yeah, your bracers give you plus two to all those damage rolls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You were 16? 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then the Bloodseeking Bow bleeds him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is currently bleeding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For ten damage each round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. Keep that in mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's hurting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Question, sorry. What happened to the big mind-control device? Is that disabled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's currently hanging right now. Seemingly disabled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the mind flayers, as far as we know, might not even be under--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Might not be, right. Potentially.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and I duck back as much as I can so I'm out of his sightline. Can I back up on the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're having to like, lean, and as you look back, like, it's a long slope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I crouch down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so, K'Varn starts K'Varn's turn. K'Varn, now, with like the poison coursing through its body, kind of just looks about and kind of shakes for a second, the eye stalks kind of looking in different directions, and just goes, (laughs) "I want to play." And begins to drift up into the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good. He can fly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I didn't know that. That's cool. Maybe we can get him out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: K'Varn moves up. At which point, you guys who were ducking down off to the side, K'Varn comes into sight as he drifts up towards the top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) Shit, shit, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's, like the thing that fell? Is it blocking any sort of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's at this angle right here. It's basically, kind of, following the temple ceiling there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We might have to get Grog out of there somehow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, first things first. It's going to fire its first ray.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it gets three eyes every turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, go ahead and make a wisdom-- No, this would be a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A secondary ray-- All right. Secondary ray is going to go ahead and fire at-- (sighs) Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Me already? I was at seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's aiming at you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're aiming at-- Sorry, I just got so scared, I heard my name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. What would that-- What is that? Oh no, okay, I see. 12?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have Inspiration. Should you need it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can add your Inspiration dice to a saving throw if you'd like.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it's a 12, plus a d10. Go ahead and roll a d10.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A d10. That's a ten?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a d10.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you bring your shield up to defend, this strange kind of grayish-green ray slams into you and you feel weightless for a moment, as, all of a sudden, you're lifted off your feet and carried down into the chamber, floating, restrained. Unable to move. And you're just kind of floating in midair right there, right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then the beam releases you. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, 'cause you're in heavy mail.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. (nervous laugh) What was it, athletics? A five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acrobatics, technically. Sorry, my fault.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, four. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks for the clarification.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take 23 points of damage as you plummet, slamming on your back on the ground and you're currently prone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Things are going well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The third ray-- All right. The third ray streaks up and is going to slam into you, Vax. Go ahead and roll a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. You see this deep bluish ray come shooting up towards you. You pull out of the way and it slams into a part of the broken metal that's left over. As it hits the metal, you see the metal turn to stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to just pull out of the way of the blast. That's going to end K'Varn's turn. That brings us to Clarota.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Clarota.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: No, Clarota!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lifts off-- to hover down into the other-- gets to about--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What you've been waiting for, Clarota.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, for the purposes of this, just for-- 'cause I don't have enough things to put up here. We'll say Clarota eventually-- At his turn-- Float from the bottom. We'll say, we'll say nearby over here. The face-- he's going to go into the Mind Blast. Okay. As Clarota lands next to it, grabs the side of its head and attempts to Mind Blast as a cone in front. K'Varn just turns and laughs in Clarota's face. (laughs) "Your kind has tried so many times." Big old toothy grin pulls across the front of the beholder. That ends Clarota's turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's still a stick floating in midair with a rope tied to it, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fantastic. I have a plan. Also, I've been curious about Targeting Shot-- If I use a Drop Targeting shot, that won't work on him, will it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the one that knocks him prone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The one that knocks flying targets down to the ground and then they fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Wing Shot, I would say that would cause him to plummet a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it wouldn't do what it says I can do here, where he's going to hit the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not necessarily. Due to the nature, you could lower his current position in the room, but his floating nature wouldn't allow him to necessarily take a lot of damage from that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to grab the rope with my bonus action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pulling out--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Shoot the damn eye!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yes. I'm pulling out the Bad News.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a shot-- Basically take a Targeted head shot at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 29. I think that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Will hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where the hell are my--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, come on. This is like, piece of cake, there's one guy. There's like eight of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, how many damage for that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's only ten points of damage, but the nice thing that that does, which is that, for the rest of his turn, up until the end of his turn, he has disadvantage on all attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since the rays automatically hit, I'll consider that those who get hit by the rays will have advantage on their saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent. I'm then going to take the rope, holding on, and I'm basically going to do a swing so that I'm out of range for any of his attacks until my next attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not swinging down into the temple, I'm swinging around the outside of it so that it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The outside over here? Okay. We'll say you're over there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's me. This may-- Okay. How big of a jump is it from me to K'Varn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say, at this distance, it's about a good 50 feet at an angle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) I'm gonna do it. Fuck it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: YOLO.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: YOLO! I'm going to run off the carpet and I'm going to do a swan dive and--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: She's not on the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius is up here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm on the edge of the platform--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Running, and I'm going to swan dive, and as I swan dive--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Athletics check, first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, don't fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. So you leap off and swan dive--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And as I get closer, mid-swan dive, I'm gonna turn into my earth elemental, and grab him, and take him down with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make a grapple check. Roll athletics again, with the earth elemental's strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Form tackle this bitch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With the earth elemental's strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I don't have this book, it's in the Monster Manual.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to say it's-- The strength is 50.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think that's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At least five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't print this out yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's a plus five to the roll for the athletics check. What is that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so. You grapple onto K'Varn, holding onto his form. K'Varn is dragged, not entirely to the ground, but is reduced to about that height.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And right before I swan dive, I go-- I yelled-- Or, before I transformed, I yell to the party, go! Get away!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Keyleth. We're not leaving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me be heroic!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you drag K'Varn, now down to just about like a ten-foot height. And is currently grappled on as K'Varn is like (grunts).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got-- Holding onto his eye stalks and I'm riding him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's leave Keyleth here and just go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, do you mean, Oklahoma? Time to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, just go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Safety word.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, it's your turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it's me? Okay, I'm going to-- Oh, she's grappling him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's grappling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You're prone on the ground, so you might want to get up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to get up, and then, I think, probably, it's time to do--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you can-- Don't feel like you shouldn't hit things because of me. I've got 126 hit points as an earth elemental and they don't affect my hit points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They don't?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once I hit zero, I go back to whatever hit points I had. I can act like a tank. Which is what I'm doing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit. Okay, so if I use the Divine-- Sorry, I just have another question about that, where I have the percentage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it only for that turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You use it once and you can't use it again for the rest of the day. That's your action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then, and then, Sarenrae just intervenes whenever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ask what kind of intervention you want, what kind of aid you want and then I decide how that functions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a little early, maybe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a little early. All right, so you know what? I'm going to do Flame Strike-- Or, sorry, I'm so shaky. What's that? Sacred Flame, Sacred Flame. I'm so sorry. Sacred Flame?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I'm going to send it on over to the beholder.

lines.name: MATT
