lines.text: Okay, what's Sacred Flame do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a cantrip.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck, I'm so sorry you guys. Where's my--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the worst.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's just-- What I just said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flame Strike, that's a horse of a different color.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, Flame Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. 5th-level Flame Strike, coming out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. I'm so stressed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A ten-foot radius and a 40-foot high platform. Where are you creating it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just right by the beholder. Just right, right-- Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Away from Clarota.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Clarota's there. God damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck Clarota. Smoke that dude.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe up against the wall or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nah, I'm going to-- Can I change it? I'm so sorry. Can I do--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck Clarota.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck Clarota? No, we can't!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing? Pike, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Guiding Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guiding Bolt?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry guys, sorry guys. (sighs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's tense. It's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guiding Bolt? Level one Guiding Bolt. All right, make a ranged spell attack against K'Varn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is at a disadvantage because K'Varn is currently grappled.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. So it's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled twice?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I roll twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take the lower one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 15, still? Total of 15?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Second one was a 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 and a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you rolled a 15, and what's your spell attack? Your spell page?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it's eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit. All right, so on a hit the target takes 4d6 radiant damage and the next attack roll made against it has advantage, so go ahead and roll 4d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 damage. All right. So the next attack on him is at advantage. As a reaction, he's going to use one of his legendary actions on its turn to-- as it gets hit and dazed-- one of its eyestalks bends over again, the same one that hit you last time is going to attempt hit you again. Go ahead and make a strength saving throw again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He hit me again because I took a long time. But my strength is really low. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. The ray slams into you again and you feel yourself lift off your feet as the beam throws you across the room, slamming into the bars on the side. As you hit them, the impact doesn't do enough damage, but suddenly these two giant, fleshy arms reach through the bars and grab you and pull you against them. You take--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Our healer is about to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of crushing damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and you are currently grappled and held against the bars.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends the legendary action. And I think you've used your movement to get up. That's your turn. That gets us to Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boy oh boy. You say you can take a hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go for it! I'm also immune to a lot of shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Chain Lightning scroll. It's the biggest thing I have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Do it! Whatever that is!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a scroll of Chain Lightning. I can't cast it at my level so it's gonna be just a 50-50 shot whether it even works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Scanlan, as you hold over the edge, you look down and you pull out the scroll and begin reading it, hopefully the arcane language will come to you. Bits of it seem familiar. I need you to go ahead and roll a d20 and add your ability modifier, which is five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ability modifier. Ten plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: K'Varn does make saving throw, so it's half damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven, eight, nine-- I need one more.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay (nervous laugh) someone do math. 15, 20, 21, 25, 30, (clears throat), 44.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say you choose the targets. Oh, not targets. It's as many as three other targets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get those monsters!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can choose not to affect your allies on this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would appreciate that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you must be within 30 feet of the target. Which, yeah, both of those would be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can choose the other, the other guys in the cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you want.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the cages? Yeah! Then yeah, yeah, that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Okay, 22 damage to that guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He gets it halved as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 44 to him. He does not make his saving throw. He's looking pretty rough. All right, this brings it-- that the end of your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nothing-- Oh, and a move. I think I'll stick, but as a bonus-- shoot, I've used all my Inspiration already, right? I can't do cantrips as a bonus, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unless it says it's a bonus action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Then never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Kima runs around to where you're on the side. Grabs the rope from you and says, "I "need to do what my destiny tells me to." Takes the rope, and rappels down. Lands there. She is going to go ahead and use her action-- If I get into combat-- She's going to cast Aura of Vitality on herself, which allows her as a bonus action to heal allies within 30 feet of her. And Pike's within-- over there. She casts the spell. Grabbing her holy symbol, this white light consumes her body for a second and creates this kind of gentle 30-foot radial area of divine energy. And she looks over at you. Go ahead and-- You heal eight points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, all right. Nice, Kima.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me too, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just-- She can choose one person per turn. All right, that finishes Kima's turn. At the top, Grog, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (Grog voice) I would like to run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she-- Is Pike still being grappled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike is still being grappled, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay, just rage. Just rage, it's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm already raging. Can I reach him? Is he high enough for me to reach? Is he out of my grasp, or I won't know until I get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You won't know until you get there. It's kind of hard to tell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whites of the eyes only. And try and just swing over my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's ten feet up. You're 8'7. With a great axe, you can reach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you! Thank god. 19 plus, Jesus. 27?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I roll all the attacks, or-- The attacks right now, and then roll damage afterwards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll the attacks now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. Yeah, okay. Jesus, what's 14 plus seven?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody keep track of this shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each of those attacks is reduced by one because your axe is currently not magical in the front of his anti-magic cone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, okay. Two plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got those numbers for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's one more 'cause it's three strikes for Frenzied, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already-- Those were three strikes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought I only did two. Yeah, I only did two. The third one's not great, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's 20-- Sorry, I heard twenty-- 21, 29, 17, sorry. So that was-- The first attack was 20--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21. The second one was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 39 was the second one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no. It added up to 39.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, the two together added up to 39.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sorry. And then, six-- 13 is the last one. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Okay, gotcha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog smash!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. All right. That brings us to the end of your turn. Tiberius, you just now get, using your full turn, you can get to where everyone else is.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, but I can, like, dash and double my movement speed as well. Which I should've done last turn. 'Cause I don't want to go there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not your speed, it's the speed of the carpet.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, shit. Okay, well, can I still dash with that and double that speed of the carpet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The carpet moves at a consistent speed.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, well I don't wanna get anywhere near that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I actually want to hover around to the city side. And I want to look and see what's going on with the crowd downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you'll be hanging over there?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there ropes still going down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one rope, currently, that is attached to the Immovable Rod, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do something stupid. I'm going to grab the rope. I'm not going to rappel, I'm going to grab about-- How high are we up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are about 50 feet up right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 50 feet, all right. I'm going to use my bonus action to get down to 25 feet and I'm going to jump-- But I'm going to jump out in the hopes of swinging this way, and swinging back towards K'Varn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Pendulum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I want to-- Pendulum at him, yeah. I want to jump out and go, woo, woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you grab the rope, leap out in that direction. Catching yourself at 25 feet. That's going to be your movement for this whole thing. So you reach up, you grab it. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Straight towards--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight towards him. Three knives, because I have friends right up against him, this is a Sneak Attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Drop some pain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, your daggers right now are not magical. Your daggers are not magical.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fine, that's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) They won't pop back in your belt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's great. That's 17, plus-- That's a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's just go ahead and roll-- That's the to-hit. So let's just go ahead and roll damage now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So there's no plus-- I forget what's added for, like, my dexterity and what's the magic-- The keen-- Oh, it's two for the keen dagger, so one plus five is six. Now here comes the Sneak Attack damage. Six plus-- There's nine, 12, 13, 18, 22 for the first. Oh, and Natural 20 is a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was your stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah that was your stealth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, I'm vibrating right now. Okay, so the second attack is a 19 plus-- 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, I'm sitting on the beholder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You are, like, now on the rope on the end of a front swing, holding onto it. As its final lair-- Final legendary action this turn, as you slam into it with the Sneak Attack, your dagger pulls out as the rope begins pulling you backward. One of the rays turns to you. I need you to go ahead and-- Let me roll here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Worth it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totally worth it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With advantage? 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You-- The kind of pinkish ray slams into your side and you feel for a second the entire room's color shift as if all of your allies turn red for a second, and anger fills your body, and you shrug it off. You feel the color fade as your backswing pulls you back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love you guys too much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Put you there for the time being. All right, that brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, well, I'm gonna just do the Hail of Thorns again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From above. Yes, as the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage on this attack 'cause you have an earth elemental currently clutching--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. It's a 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 just hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Okay. So that's 3d10. Ugh, what? 28.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those zeroes look so good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they do. 28, plus I get my two from my bracers, right? So that's 30, plus my Hunter's Mark-- 32 for the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the second-- I wanna do it with the fire string.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, disadvantage. That's-- Oh, that doesn't hit. Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's gonna miss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So the second attack doesn't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I want to kind of duck down. Do I still get to move Trinket at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's still got Fly on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, if you're still maintaining concentration on that. No no, you cast Blur. So he's no longer flying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's just hanging out next to me on top of a roof?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just pet Trinket and tell him to duck down. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket's already ducking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we're both ducking now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: K'Varn takes ten damage from the bleed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) What about the poison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Poison wore off. All right, so. So let me see, what was-- What effect is giving him disadvantage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, from your head shot. Awesome. All right, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, Pike too, right? Didn't she have an advantage thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was one-time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first thing he's going-- All right, so, one beam turns around and sprays this pitch-black ray that careens across the room. This one is going to slam into-- Let's see where it goes. All right, that's going to hit Percy. It arcs up. I need you to go ahead and make a---

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have cover? I thought I had cover, but okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cover, unfortunately, for these doesn't make a difference. Rays are magical instant. Need you to make a dexterity saving throw with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to go for Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that plus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Saving throw at the top of your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? You try and move out of the way but the beam hits you on the side of your torso. You feel a familiar sensation, back when that proto-lich was drawing the life force from you from the phylactery that was sewn in your chest. I need you-- Nope. You take 55 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Are you surprised? I'm not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not in the room.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I don't care.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, stop being so pouty, you knew this was coming.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm doing it through here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And this time, a pale greenish ray comes streaking across. This one's going to be aimed at Scanlan. Go ahead and make a dexterity save with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiberius. Can you rally the illithid?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What the hell do you think I'm doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop being a dick.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm angry at all of you right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because she cast enhance dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. Yeah. So you duck out of the way and the beam just (shhh) past you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're-- Yeah, totally. I don't know what I did, but you're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it hits part of the stone nearby you, wherever the beam hits the stone, the stone is just no longer there. It's like it just carved through it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was this one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very similar to what Queen Ulara did to the top of the throne room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disintegrate. You could've been dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As movement, K'Varn's going to try and break your grapple. Go ahead and make another athletics check. Keyleth, athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I was shell-shocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll, plus five. Roll, plus five. d20 plus five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? K'Varn pushes you off, you lose your grip and fall, onto your feet, but onto the ground there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: K'Varn then goes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, do I have advantage for that? Still? Do I still have advantage for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no. That's only for your saving throws.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: K'Varn is then going to go ahead and glide back up. No, actually it's going to be like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whew! Grog, you okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. (scoffs) But a tickle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to end K'Varn's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No one told me he had a lightsaber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: K'Varn saves against the bleed, is no longer bleeding, and he just starts laughing. (laughs) As you see, like, black energy seeping in around. And you can see visible wounds that Grog has left are slowly stitching. That brings us to Clarota, who is still kind of hovering in levitation. Clarota comes to the ground and lands, looks up, the tentacles pull back, brings one hand down and the arcane sigils you've seen appear on the hands both light up. And then releases a bolt of lightning energy up into the air towards K'Varn. Okay, K'Varn does make his dexterity saving throw. Takes half-damage on that. That is 18 points of lightning damage. And he's going to move back to there. At the end of Clarota's turn, legendary action. He's going to use the secondary ray. The ray is going to be-- All right. Streaming up towards the top again. Scanlan, I need you to go ahead and make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three rays on its turn and then it gets to make three individual ray attacks on other people's turns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's still, technically speaking though, we would still have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage, until your next turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I use my Cutting Words?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, it isn't an attack roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not an attack, okay. Then a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So a familiar beam streaks up, kind of a deep green color slams into you. And you feel yourself chucked off the top, restrained, and then pulled down with severe force into the center of the temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, into the room? But I don't want to be in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then the beam releases you. You go slamming into the ground. Go ahead and make an acrobatics roll. You have advantage because of your dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 11 points of damage. Managing to land harshly on one knee and foot. You feel that's going to suck in the morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No problem. Easy, easy

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Clarota's turn. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I'm taking-- I'm taking another aimed shot at the-- I'm taking another head shot. Straight into the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that's 29 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 to hit. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you crit on 18?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't remember. Did we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it. No I don't. So that's 15 points of damage. And he has-- he maintains that thing where everyone still has saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Good

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm then, I'm actually going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I should have done this last round by the way, as a point. I need you to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw. You are firing a Bad News on a small five-foot platform on top of a temple. There is kickback on this. I'm just keeping tabs on this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so you are going to need a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Constitution save to hold your footing because that is a big, loud, powerful kickback blast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. It blows you back, but you manage to keep your foot from going over the edge. Keep your footing at the top. And reload with your second attack. All right. Percy, you going to stay where you are or going to move?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to duck. I'm going to step back from from the edge, just so that I'm not in its eyeline for a little bit. I'm going to catch a breather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, fastball special? Want me to toss your ass up there? See if you can grapple on to him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, can you throw me at his side away from his eyeball?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If not, it doesn't matter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to cheerleader-toss Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I want to take Grog and push him up to see if he can essentially do what I did to K'Varn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Grog's turn doesn't come for a while, for the next round of combat. So you would throw Grog and then Grog would come back down. Grog is just now coming off this series of frenzied attacks. So you would--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unfortunately it's just out of reach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hold my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold your turn, all right. 'Til Grog's?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Til Grog's

lines.text: All right. Keyleth out of the line. Back to the top of the next round. Pike, you're up. You're currently (grunts).

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check, with disadvantage because you're in plate mail.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holds on to you and you take three points of crushing damage as the arms are still pulling you against the top. It rolled really poorly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three points? Okay, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have one action and a bonus action should you choose to use them.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So where's my-- and I'll do it at-- Cure Wounds, I'm sorry. I am so flummoxed at the moment. So nervous for all things. Okay. I'll do it at-- let's see. 13.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've heard worse ideas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 3d8 plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can get Grog, Scanlan, Keyleth.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 20. Is that also including myself?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I think that's your turn, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up. You're currently face-down on the ground. Or no, sorry, you're on, like, your hurt knee. You're not prone, you manage to catch yourself up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stand, I look at the creature. No, I don't look at the creature. (laughs) I just sort of look near the creature, and I will punch it in its face with Bigby's Hand.

lines.text: All righty, let's go ahead and pull this up real fast. How does the-- What's the effect on that one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strength of 26. Blah blah blah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the Clenched Fist.

lines.text: Clenched Fist.

lines.text: It's a melee attack, it's like--

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total of ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not very strong.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell is nullified.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn! All right. Are you still hurting, Grog? As my bonus action, I'm going to give Grog some more healing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh, six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight. I'll take it. That's eight. That's great. Oh, you rolled for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled. You get six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great. That comes to Kima's turn. Kima, who's now landed and cast that spell on her is going to go ahead and use an ability called Sacred Weapon. She pulls out the hammer and as she brings her hand across it, this divine flame begins to burn around the base of where she's holding it and the giant head of the maul.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Badass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog and Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: TALIESIN, ORION
lines.text: Fastball Special.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a strength check. So just roll and add five to it.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. 600 pounds--

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: You're pretty freaking huge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty freaking huge.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, you go ahead and roll a strength check as well, as you're also pushing off of her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck yes. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. Between him pushing off the force of your hands, you manage to move over, leap in the air approximately at his height. Before you plummet, what are you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.text: You grab onto the horn and you're dangling from it right now. Ugh! You can feel, just to the touch of your hand, there's this freezing cold sensation. As you look up, you can see frost beginning to build around the outside of your fingers. It's immediate frostburn on your fingers, but you're holding tight. And you have this giant eye moving in front of you, rapidly looking around angrily. This giant, toothy maw, just behind you, with a tongue lashing about. And this voice, right in your face, going, "Oh, you don't wanna do that, boy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I have an Intelligence of six. Watch this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action. What's your bonus action?

lines.text: Can I grab and kick off and try and rip it off his head? Or is that all the same thing?

lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll try that. At least trying to kick my feet into his eye. Maybe it works, maybe it doesn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20. That's all you gotta do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have Inspiration.

lines.text: And it's ten?

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: It's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the eyelid has been closed from the impact of your feet, and this horrible snarling sound, "What are you doing?" So that's your turn. At the end of your turn, it's going to go ahead and do another lair--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not in a good spot!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lair action on you. Because you're in its face, I'm going to say it would give him advantage. However, that's negated by him so you just have a straight roll on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want you to go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Oh shit. 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shrug it off out of just the general fury and anger, realizing that you, wouldn't matter, being raging, are immune to charm effects. All right, that ends your turn. Tiberius? Still over here.

lines.name: ORION

lines.text: Great, I jump off the carpet. I cast Fly on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I go to where I can just, right, hover-- I want to hover above them, about 20 feet away. And as I come to it, I'm going to flip out the carpet, get on it, cast Alter Self, turn into Clarota. I'm going to keep my original lungs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, hold on. One turn.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to-- Yeah, I'll spend whatever I gotta spend. I'm doing all of it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Can they see me? The crowd that's coming?

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Okay. Just letting you know. You're pretty much going to have to let the carpet go, or take it down slower. So as you coast down, you get to about this point. You said you cast Fly on yourself, or are you just going to go for the Alter Self?

lines.text: Wait, what'd you say? 20?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus ten?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Plus nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus nine.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You stumped him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's-- No, there's a really, really, really fine line here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh yes.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Not if they're allies.

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.text: Yeah, it might've been. You might've started it.

lines.text: That's good, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was great.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm going to run-- I'm still Hasted directly underneath the mind flayer. And throw the daggers up.

lines.text: You mean K'Varn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, sorry. Thank you. Yes, and here we go. Ten. First attack is a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, with disadvantage on both those attacks because you currently have Grog dangling from the creature.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one. That's a 15. Misses, right? And the second one, come on, man, is a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And there's no non-magical effect on me at the moment, right? 'Cause I'm out of his vision? So that's a nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just for damage? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Final ray.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come sit on me, dude. Come on down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. This stalk now gives off this weird yellowish-- Like a very faint yellowish see-through color, kind of scoops across the ground, right past you, after you throw the dagger. Go ahead and roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's able to-- I just don't know, I'm not challenging it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has stalks everywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even under-- On its tushie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These stalks aim down.
