lines.text: Oh. I was going off that, okay. All right, so what am I making at the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage, because Percy--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Advantage, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's me. Okay. I'm going-- Grog is dangling from him, but I'm still going to try to shoot him. I'm going to try to shoot him with the Ensnare arrow that I have from Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try to maybe see if I can tie some of those stalks down to his head with it. Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a hairnet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like a little hairnet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an attack with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The disadvantage was a-- What was that, 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total 20? Okay. That hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Science!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so what do I-- How do I do that? With the Ensnare arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially how it works is it works like a Tanglefoot bag. It slams into it. You roll damage for the arrow, and it bursts over him like a giant package of globby, thick glue. Just (pfft).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 damage. All right. It looks a little goopy. The purpose of the Tanglefoot bag usually is to stick something to something, like a creature on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. I didn't know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he's got goop on him. Doesn't seem to be affecting him much. You wanna fire another arrow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought it was like a sort of wrap-around-y arrow. It wasn't like a-- I thought it was like a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a bolo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a bolo-y thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I thought this was the Tanglefoot arrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Tanglefoot was basically like a wire thing. Yeah, it was a bolo arrow. That's how it-- That was how I originally pitched it, was a bolo arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what he told me it was a long time ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Then, given that circumstance, the bolo wraps around him. Bolos--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hopefully taking some of the stalks, pinning it to his body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They kind of fall over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It wraps around some of the eyestalks or parts and doesn't seem to have an additional effect than the damage. Unfortunately, it's just-- bolo against beholder it's kind of a square peg in a hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I was just hoping I could pin a stalk or two. All right, the second one, with the burning bow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wasn't that the same thing as the first one? Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't see the second one. 17?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15, 24? Okay, so. Ten, 11, 12. 16 plus ten for the burning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I duck down again and try to drop out of his view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings it to K'Varn's turn. K'Varn is going to attempt to shrug you off the horn, Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First it's going to fly up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, great, yeah. That's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to fly up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had to grab that thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move underneath so I can maybe catch Grog from where I cheerleader--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, right now, no.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Why are you cheerleading somebody?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Prep. Prep for the basket? Because I imagine it was like a cheerleader.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your hand lets go and you plummet backward again, slamming into the ground. Make an acrobatics check to try and reduce the damage if you like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You go ahead and slam into the ground. You manage to reduce the damage somewhat, but your back cracks into the part of stone that raises up over the platform. You, unfortunately, you reduce the damage somewhat, but you still end up taking 14 points of damage from the impact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you are prone. That was K'Varn's movement. Now, K'Varn is going to go ahead and fire three additional rays. All right. The kind of pinkish-red ray streaks across and is going to slam into you. Go ahead and make your saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's all the way up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be a wisdom saving throw with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. The beam comes across, hits you in the shoulder, kind of goes across the front of your chest. For a moment, you feel this kind of bloodthirsty urge fill you and you just wince and feel it wash over your body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, thank god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The second one is going to go ahead and streak down towards Grog. Grog, I need you to go ahead and make a dexterity check. With, I'll say disadvantage 'cause you're on the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But the advantage cancels-- advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, so it'd be just a regular roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five? All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Regular roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a strong five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a pissed-off goliath five. (laughs) I am Kerri Strug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog, you take 61 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 61 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the black ray that is carrying that heavy aura of shadow, just beams into the ground, slamming into your torso.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you at?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks for the Death Ward. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second ray into Grog. He touched the horn and really pissed it off. All right. Go ahead and make a constitution saving throw, Grog.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? A secondary beam, this one like a deep reddish-brown color, slams into your torso. You take 36 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Death Ward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Death Ward is activated?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as the beam is about to blast your body into severe shock, you feel that surge of Sarenrae's energy guide over you and pull back with one hit point left. K'Varn, frustrated, looks down at you with your eyes still open and goes, "No!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can someone handle the fucking meatball?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One, one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a strength saving throw, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. Again? He's getting it again?

lines.name: ASHLEY, TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clarota's going to-- Hold on, let's see if he gets his Mind Blast back. Nope. He's going to go ahead and attempt another Lightning Bolt.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm so stressed out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've never looked so intensely at a little plastic toy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck you, little plastic toy. You're not the boss of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't even look at it. I've been looking down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of lightning damage against K'Varn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Full view of the eyeball, like, "Fuck you".

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of Clarota's turn, K'Varn's going to use a legendary action to fire another beam at Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He hates you, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this an automatic hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all the beams automatically hit. Go ahead and make another dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dexterity. That's your good die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who's next?" Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, weird question. (laughs) All right, we've got a giant spiral machine hanging by two chains right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to peek over the edge. And is there a way that if I happen to snap one of those chains that that thing would go slamming into him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull over and make that shot. I'm going to steady myself, sit down, and I'm going to make that shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Bad News aimed up. You're aiming-- You're probably going to have to move around to this side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is very careful, around the two of them-- Oh, actually, you'd probably go around this side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I go around the other way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you make your way to here. You kneel down with the Bad News. You aim for one of the weak points of the metal, bent and ruined from the swinging of the platform. You grabbed that horn, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Does not hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does not hit a not-moving target?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no no. I was thinking of his AC. That hits the platform, I'm so dumb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So-- Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, that does hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven, eight, nine, ten. 15 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage? Go ahead and make a constitution save as the blast of the Bad News threatens to push you back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeping your low stance, you keep yourself, with strain, on the top. The blast hits the side of the metal. The metal streaks and breaks and snaps. The single bit of the contraption swings widely, slamming into the side of K'Varn. K'Varn does not make his dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Very good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: K'Varn takes 36 points of damage. The blast of the arcane nature of the contraption and the impact from-- It slams into him, pushing him all the way to the side over here. So, leaving you right where you were, there. And you can see now, part of the metal armor has completely been destroyed by the impact. So the AC actually lowers for K'Varn, and he's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool. Bonus action. I'm shooting him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you mean the Action Surge?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Action Surge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 'cause you used your second attack to reload.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Well, I used my second attack to reload. Now I'm on my-- Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You-- Unfortunately, from your position, since it slammed in this direction, you don't have eyesight on him, unless he's considered having cover right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have I actually moved all six of my-- All six of my spaces for movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To move around the whole platform? Yeah, you would have had to. You can still fire, but he'll have three-quarters cover.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I ignore three-quarters cover!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then fucking fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. All right. I'm spending the last of my Grit to do yet another head shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't he just a giant head?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, it's a head shot. It has an effect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm shooting him in the eyeball, basically. That's a 29 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of damage? All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 18 points of damage, plus the same thing. Everyone gets this-- So everyone gets advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's so obnoxious! All right. That's Percy's turn. Pike, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to-- Can I run over to Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try to go ahead and-- You have to try and break the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The grapple was off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, 'cause the grapple guy got hit. All right, yeah, so you can go do that. Move over to Grog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Matt, can't you remember where ten people are at once?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, technically.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to try this. I'm going to put my hands on him. Try to cast Revivify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you reach down, you pray to Sarenrae to aid you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But he put it in the Mending Wheel!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He put it in the Mending Wheel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, remember it didn't work.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It didn't work? Okay, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach down and touch Grog, and his cold, still body-- You feel the divine energy begin to instill his form. I need you to go ahead and make a wisdom check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I have Gnome Cunning, so I get to-- I get advantage on wisdom checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes you do. From which one? From Gnome's Cunning?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. So what do I add?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wisdom, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For her racial background, she chooses-- she's a deep gnome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's such a racist. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Look that up really fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deep gnome, rock gnome? Okay, Gnome Cunning is you have advantage on all saving throws against magic. This was a check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so that's not a thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well, it's okay. The high-- The first one was-- It would still be--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The first one was 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Okay. As you put your hands in, you feel this surge of warmth, and some of the coldness in the air is pulled back in as Grog's chest rises up with breath, once again. Grog, the darkness fades and your eyes come clear. You're looking up, on your back, into the room. You're at one hit point, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For Revivify. But you're alive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He needs-- He's one hit point now, so he needs a potion. Do you have potions?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have a potion for a bonus action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do, but it's not my turn. Or can I take a hit dice at any time?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I give him a potion?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shove it in his mouth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have to wait for my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's right there. I'd say, yeah, you can do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to give him a potion. I'm going to-- I have a big one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we have a superior.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I have a superior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And what does a superior do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Superior is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like 100 hit points, I think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is 8d4 plus eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why didn't I buy one of those?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't die. Again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) I'm trying not to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the amount? What you got?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like you could just yank it off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Yeah, yeah. It seemed totally reasonable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were with you. We were totally with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wasn't he-- It wasn't even his. He's like-- I thought he was wearing it. The fucker's on there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Way better than one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. It's something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go. All right. At the end of your turn, Pike, K'Varn is angrily going to use a legendary action to go ahead and fire another beam at you, since you went ahead and healed him up. All right, go ahead and make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You manage to dodge out of the way before it hits the stone around you, carving just past Grog. No effect. However, where it hits the stone, you can see the stone is carved in this giant groove, like the beam itself is like a giant welding torch.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! Hey! Oh, hi guys. Do I blind it or do I attack it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blind it. No, I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he looking at me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are down here. He's not currently really looking at-- Actually, no. He was looking down at them. So it's that-- So yeah, you'd be in the current cone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or get out of his eyesight. Remember, your magic--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to blind his big eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With Blindness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have to move. You're currently in his eyesight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he can see me? I'm in his field of vision?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, then never mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Move out of the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just move to the right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Move out of the cone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll move out of the cone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Past Clarota. Maybe out--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And now I try to blind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I-- Through the Hand Cone of Clarity, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That is a 20. What is your DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Blinded by the light.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (sings) Wrapped up like a douche, another roller in the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC of your spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you release the spell, the eyestalks turn and you can see the darkness that normally fades over the eyes just gloss over and dissipate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Well then, as my bonus action, I'll give Grog just a little bit more healing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take it. Thank you, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It's now Kima's turn. Kima's going to hold off, looks over at Keyleth and says, "If you can give me another one of those tosses like you gave Grog?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grunting affirmatively)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima holds. Back at the top of the round.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's in human form, by the way. (laughs) It's just how she talks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My turn? Is it my turn? Sure. I'll go ahead-- Since she's a tiny dwarf, I'll--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's that, just a strength check as an elemental, I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, add five to the d20 roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. All right. You send Kima flying in the air, maul arcing through the sky. As she arcs the mark above her, a giant flash of divine energy, just kind of sparks in-- Is left behind her like a giant trail through the sky. She brings the hammer down towards K'Varn. That is a 21, that hits. As she slams into it, Kima-- Go ahead and throw-- Is going to go ahead and throw a 3rd-level spell into Divine Smite, doing an additional 3d8 damage on top of that. That'll be 38 points of divine damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see, now, portions of the eye starting to swell. K'Varn's looking pretty rough. Kima, however, just continues to go and attempts to land-- Does not make the athletics check and takes-- Okay, that'll be 22 points of damage from the fall. And is prone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the fall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Run. Away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I still prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I stand up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. That's your movement to get up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my movement to get up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: God, son of a bitch. He's looking at me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's kind of looking in that direction. Not directly down at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I'm in the cone of shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just on the cusp of it, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use the Chain of Returning to throw my axe at him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, 'cause I can't move anywhere, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can heal yourself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think-- Can I use it-- Can I heal myself after I throw it? Can I? Or is it one or the other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Put it this way. Since you stood up, you're now like cusping in the cone-- The anti-magic cone. Any potions drank in that area will have no effect. Magic, the actual potions, are dispelled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had to stand up. Let's throw an axe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll to attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like Ren Faire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach back, you lob the axe. The Chain of Returning, now also in the cone of anti-magic, just snaps off the axe. The axe goes flying across the room, clattering to the ground underneath the corner over here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's almost dead, he's almost dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Chain of Returning's magic?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's almost dead until he kills.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything that has a name, like Chain of Something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tiberius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was like, just, Chain of Cool. Awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you still running for Congress out there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chain of Dope.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm not-- That's probably not going to work. I head back up to the top. Actually, no, I don't. I go to the side of the temple where the rope that I was throwing earlier goes and meets down to the floor. So I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you head down towards the base of the temple.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah. I will-- No, I-- Fuck, no. Hold on a second, I don't do that. I redact that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I have the fucking carpet, okay. I go back to the top. I can get up there, right, like where they are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should lob a Fireball.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, just throw a Fireball from the outside, just throw one.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Does he see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you're visible up here. You can see him, he can see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you're not in the cone. He's looking down.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's what I mean, like is he looking at me, right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's kind of looking in this direction right now.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to get the fucking killing blow, man.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to cast Telekinesis and rip his horn off his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make the check for Telekinesis.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Well, that doesn't happen. Oh, actually-- I used that. Yeah, no. That doesn't hit. So I'll have to spend another--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so, as you release the Telekinesis, you pull and pull, but that horn is definitively locked in place.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay. Then I'll spend five more and I'll attempt to rip off one of his tentacles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stalks? Okay. Go ahead, make another check.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to check that last one off. Check this off. I'm blast-- I'm using all these from my Ioun stones!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I, yeah. That hits. What is that? My, 20-- Oh no-- Fuck what I said, it's 29.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you pull, one of the eye stalks gets flung off the body, and you can see this, like, spurt of brackish blood that spills across the area nearby.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I hope it was a Disintegration ray one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll 3d6.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, it does damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four damage. All right, Tiberius. Ends your turn.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And I hop off the carpet and I leave it there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Or, I hand it to-- Who's next to me? Uh, you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just, yeah, just let-- The carpet there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought Vax was up before me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax is up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah, Vax is first, sorry. Go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am? And Keyleth has already done her fastball special, that couldn't happen again at the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 26 to hit for the dagger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (mouths) Thank you for your patience. Boss battle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was thanking them for their patience.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, sure sure. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if I'm in his cone or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I'm not in his cone then that's a ten of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The next is-- I'm going to use a Luck point, because I have one more. And I get 20--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, 25. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is ten of damage, and the last dagger is a one, so it just flies away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hail of Thorns as a level three. That is, doesn't hit. That's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, unfortunately, no. It hits the side of the wall. Explodes, sending a series of wooden spikes into the stone on the side of the temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool. I can't do that again, can I? All right, then I'm just gonna shoot him through the flaming bow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used flaming bow twice already, so you no longer can use it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to use it. I'm just going to shoot him. This is fun, guys. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits. Go and roll damage with your Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 13. And 15. 20 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanna-- Oh god. How do I want to do this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to do it crying, I know that much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do, I'm crying. I want to shoot him-- Is it possible to shoot him right where the horn meets his head and knock it off of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, then I shoot him straight in the eyeball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as K'Varn's looking around, kind of frantic at this point, realizing that this whole swarm of individuals are pouring into the temple. That, looking around, you can sense that the-- It's lost control of the Elder Brain. It starts just getting extremely manic and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vox Machina!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vox Machina!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It strikes down, going right into the pupil. The light blue color immediately bursts into an angry red as the eye closes over, trying to contain the impact. The blood begins to pour out of the front of the eye, as the arrow, you can see pierce out the back side and is jutting about six inches out the back of the Beholder. And K'Varn slowly sinks a few feet and just slams onto the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is how it's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I hug Trinket so tight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So on K'Varn's turn, black energy begins to pull into the horn, and the beholder opens the eye again. Now, the light blue color is just a pale white and you can see the jaw's a little slack. But the horn is now glowing this intense black color. And the beholder gets back up from his position.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. He's zombie beholder now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which, Kima's on the ground, says, "Shit! Orcus! God of undeath, of course!" And she's going to start getting ready on her end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evil god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, is this like another boss?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The horn was from Orcus. He's not a demigod.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just two more hours. We got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: K'Varn's going to take another ray attack at-- Let's see. So a dexterity save against-- This would be Kima on the ground. Kima fails. Kima's form begins to slowly turn to stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Oh no, Kima's stoned.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She turned to stone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kima's stoned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kima's turning to stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her body's like--Secondary one is-- I rolled that one. All right, can I get a wisdom saving throw from you, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Sure, I'm not worried.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Natural 20.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A wave of fear hits your mind for a second, watching it rise up, but you've seen many horrible things and it's not enough to shake your will and resolve. Third one. All right. Can I get a dexterity saving throw? This will be from you, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jump.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, with advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) With advantage!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus your dex, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't add anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a dull green ray fires out from the currently undead K'Varn, you take 45 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sweet. All right, all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still alive, still alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still conscious?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep, she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. (laughs)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many? How many did you say?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 45. Okay. Just to be clear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck this!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is the end of, like, Iron Man 3 right now. I'm kind of, I'm a little irritated.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: And that was a terrible movie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I loved it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Clarota, do it for your fellow squid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 15 points of psychic damage and is now trying to grapple the tentacles around the front of K'Varn-- The side of K'Varn's head. That brings us to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hop on the magic carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And start heading in, and I'm going to get-- I'm going to get myself down and I'm taking a shot at the horn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the horn? All right. This is going to be at disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I'm so close?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're-- Because you're on the carpet flying down, making a specific shot at a very, very tiny object.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh look, there's a man with a gun on a flying carpet, coming in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 against the horn, unfortunately, will not hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It hadn't been for disadvantage--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, it's Divine Intervention time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you're using your action to call on Divine Intervention. How do you want to call your deity? It doesn't need to be anything too specific, it'd be just, "To aid me." Whatever you feel like.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just, sort of, aid every--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab your holy symbol. What do you shout out to Sarenrae?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Help us kill this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll 2d10. Go ahead and-- So roll the first one. The second one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, at this depth, Sarenrae's influence is a little too far away to come into this moment. And you feel the intervention isn't quite strong enough to really make her presence known at this point. But you feel a sense of warmth and comfort knowing that, at least, she's looking over you, but thinks, "You don't need my aid at this moment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes we do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's your action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's my action, okay. So, now all I can do is move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Move, bonus action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I-- Actually, can I Divine Strike, also?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that's-- I think that's an action, unfortunately

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think that's a-- Okay. All right, well, I'll just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Potion? Potion potion potion potion.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yeah, I'll take a potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it. Heal yourself on that. That brings us to Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Lightning Bolt on the thing with the bad guy. Lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lightning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Lightning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And hell, I'll do it at a higher level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At what level?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is level three normally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's level two for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think Lightning Bolt is level three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm sorry, level four. Level four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So that'll be 9d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does make his saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so it's half this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, come on, buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! Lost one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's by your feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, so 13 points of lightning damage. The side of K'Varn's undead form. You can see part of the flesh is now blown off the side, hanging limply. Part of the teeth on the inside of the mouth are now visible. It's still standing, held together by the power of the horn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I give some healing to Pike, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Hey! Hey baby, hey baby, hey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) It's late. It's late.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Hey baby, hey baby, hey.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not much. Oh, it's eight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima and Keyleth. Kima is going to stand up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nine? Okay, great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I counted wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, because she was prone, that kind of takes her turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is the situation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. What was that? What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that situation with the-- The hanging, you know, Metropolitan Museum of Art piece?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's currently dangling right here. Right above you, precariously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I as a rock monster go up to it and grab it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. It looks very heavy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's very heavy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so beat it in the face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to try and bring it down on top of K'Varn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kind of in the middle of a bunch of stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The process of doing that will probably take out a few other people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Punch the eyeball.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm then just going to run and just do a double strike. Well, you know what? I'm going to run in and just grapple him. I'm going to grapple him again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima turns to solid stone locked in place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Kima!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. You have no axe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 'Cause I'm a hoarder. Can I get around behind it by going to its left-- Between it and the cage? Can I fit through there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Or just to its side, at least?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get to its side over here, maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You rush over. As you pass by, this creature steps forward and is going to attempt to grapple you. Through the bars, that's going to be a 14. Go ahead and roll athletics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, you've been working out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take seven points of crushing damage, and are currently grappled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Crushing damage does-- nope. How many was it? 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you take seven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're grappled. You're still next to K'Varn, you just can't move any further.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you could still attack him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'd like to take the Greatsword of Frenzy out of the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can do that with your bonus action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, I wanted the bonus action to drink a potion, but fuck it, I'd like to swing at the giant little shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit. Then roll 2d6 for the damage, plus your strength modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 damage, all right. You slice through part of its body. You can see, now, three stalks slide off, and you can see some of the brain tissue underneath, but yet its still-necrotic form is holding it in place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Who's next? Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: How many stalks does it have left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has probably nine.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Covered in stalks, dude. Looking really rough, though.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My magic attacks have been using-- Working from above, Tiberius.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Where is it, actually?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's right here.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: From where-- Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shoot him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zip, zap, zop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get 'im.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Okay, I'll do a-- I'll shoot a Glacial Blast at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Just a concentrated-- I'll spike it right before it hits him and jam it in his fucking eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That's a dexterity save, right?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage, takes half damage.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: 6d8. Oh shit, I need d8 for this. Do you have d8s?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here, d8s.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do, Mr. Pack Away Your Dice.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I got it. That is 40.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40. So half that is 20 damage? How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? What just happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're killing him again. But then--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three more forms to go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two of ten times.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Two of ten times. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do with your Glacial Blast?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll just-- I mean, like I said. Right before I do it, I'll shape it into an ice spike and right through the eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, you take your arcane form, and you can see, where the impact of the arrow left behind from Vex is already still there and the eye's kind of slightly concave as the wound's open. You take the Glacial Blast into one giant jagged piece of ice and you thrust it forward with all your arcane might. It hits and sinks into the eye and as it streaks to the inside, it bursts from the interior. You see ice shards piercing it from the inside out. As the form kind of lands on the ground there, as ice begins to slowly form and crackle around its outside, you can still see dark energy pulling into the horn.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wonderful, while I-- No! I spend five Sorcerer points and I do Telekinesis and rip the horn off his fucking--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many Sorcery points do you have?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's it after that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why not-- I can just rip it off. I'm a rock dude.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: It's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make your roll.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: What is that? Oh, that's 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26. With a sickening tearing sound, you notice the shaking of the horn begin to slowly pull from the slightly dilapidated and decomposing form of K'Varn. As the horn begins to tug and tear, the flesh stretches before, eventually, it's torn from the body. The moment the horn rises up, all that black energy dissipates, the horn held aloft in mid-air. The rest of K'Varn's form slumps to the ground and slowly begins to melt away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'll hold it in place for now and kind of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just slam over its head?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't touch it to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No he's-- Telekinesis, is he's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. But don't touch it to the thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Oh, right. Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like the thing at the end of Time Bandits. We should just--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, I just killed it. Don't tell me what to do, dawg.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Don't tell me what to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, you're so ornery. We fucking brought you back in here. We told you to hit it.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Wait 'til we're not fighting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as K'Varn's horn is now currently held aloft via your Telekinesis--

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I hold it here. I don't want to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. It looks like, currently, the battle, for the moment--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is held as you guys sit here in the center of the temple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got a bunch of illithid coming in here soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, we do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The loose, pale, pulsing glow of the Elder Brain slowly glowing brighter and brighter.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh. As I see that, I'm going to float this more towards me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm going to hold it about 25 feet away from me in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And from that point, we'll conclude this evening's epic boss encounter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holy shit, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't die!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, speak for yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did have a death. But you had a spell to bring him back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Death Ward for the win.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Irresponsible--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, please. Pooper face. You were so poopy the entire end of that game.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: You have no idea. You have no idea what you guys are in for after this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why? What are you-- What are we in for?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: I'm not going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He knows everything.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's not-- That's the next episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm with Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a marathon session. Thank you all for your patience. Thanks for staying.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you guys for sticking out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that was a long one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many of you are going to have a hard day at work in the morning?

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Guys, I'm just totalling up all the donations that we had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Sweet!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good job, Matt. Good. Job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys-- Between your head shots--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, your head shots fucking MVP, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- were MVP on that battle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The setup of both slamming it with the device and getting the device out of the way, the surprise entry of this. Because you guys weren't all ground level, that kept him floating, which meant he couldn't keep using the cone of-- there was a lot of good things you guys used tactically for this battle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Vex had a lot of hit points, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Pike, thanks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First kill.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, it was my first--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It, well, here. Since we've started here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, that was your first on the stream, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Was that your first?

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Yeah, that was my first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bunch of firsts, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aww, saved that for the boss fight, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So sleepy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can-- I'm still being grappled by whatever's in that cage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So we still have a lot to fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We still got a lot to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we've got to get the hell out of here, now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you even tell us what's in the cage, since we never even looked?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you stop that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, he won't tell me!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I have a question-- Is the game going to continue next week, or are you guys taking a week--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm thinking what we're going to do, guys, for next week, those who are watching, too, because we have a few members that are going to be gone next week on vacation, we're going to-- I'm just basically going to be doing a brief discussion, I'd say a few hours, talking with you guys about how to learn the game, how to DM and build a game, and to answer your questions about the system at all, and just do, generally, a Dungeons & Dragons-specific kind of workshop for you guys. And then, the week after that, we'll pick up where this left off. Oh, I'm exhausted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My ears are like, 102 degrees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're kind of pinky, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: All right. By the way, do you guys want to know how many shirts we sold?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Everything is over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Over.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah, you guys went through it, man. Right through it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sweating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, we're all so jittery.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need a drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't TPK.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where we can go and, like-- Go, just, what the fuck just happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just so excited.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have Schmoozer, donated $25. "Another 25 to you guys to correct myself for last week. I'm "slowly falling more and more in love with you guys. Since the Overlord says my original message "implied I wasn't in love at the start, but I surely was." (laughter)

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I was trolling you, dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Thank you, Tristan. McBrian donated $25 to 826LA. "First time I've been able to watch "live, and I would like to Rage. Love you all." Anarchy, hey! Donated $10. "Just wanted to say "thank you to Matt, Taliesin, Orion, and Marisha for coming to visit our tower in the Minecraft "Server. We added a shooting range for Percy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm working on Shorthalt's Hall of Lady Favors."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will have a frequent member pass there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The twins are on deck."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those song parodies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those parodies are pretty funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: OZack66 donated 100 bucks. "A shoutout to my lovely elven ladies Keyleth and Vex. (speaking in Elven)" He wrote in Elven. (speaking in Elven)

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I don't know what that is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, say that again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I butchered that horribly. Want me to say that again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, Zac was talking over you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (speaking in Elven) I am so sorry if I butchered that. I haven't spoken Sindarin or Quenya since high school.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Oh, Elven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Elven, guys. What'sAMeadow donated 25 bucks. "I'll keep this short and sweet. Thank you "guys both in front of the camera and behind. I found you guys through Matt's game on Pewdiepie's "channel and I love everything you do. Keep going guys, LessThanThree."

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Best day of the week has arrived and Critical "Role is back in action. I had a bit extra this week so I'm happy to give to this amazing "charity." Aww. Thank you so much. CloudyWolf donated $10. "I always love Thursdays and Critical "Role validates that. Happy to give what I can to an amazing charity that supports making the future "a lot brighter. Thank you all for all you do and bringing back my joy of playing D&D with old "friends." Aww. Mage61968 donated $20. "Wanted to donate for my favorite show on Twitch. Bought my "Critical Role shirt today, looking forward to new ones. Also do you have any plans to attend "AnimeExpo in July? Would like to say hi to those who do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few of us are going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll probably be there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: HuffGirl77 donated 20 bucks. "Tonight is the first time I was able to catch the live stream. It's "been a hard week and this is my lovely bright point. Thank you so much, you guys are amazing." Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Glad we didn't die during your hard week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well. I died.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nyphelion donated 50 bucks. "I bear gifts from MathSquad. If your viewers are interested in "GM things, they should look into Being Everything Else. A show by GMs for GMs mostly with new ones "in mind." Very cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best game yet. Ashley, I have a surprise for you "in the Minecraft server. I'll finish as quick as I can. Travis, I started smelting the metal from a "meteorite we found in the desert for my cosplay axe."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Is she serious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy's smelting the metal from a meteorite to forge his axe of Grog for his cosplay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to have an alien axe?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to be his.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's making his axe to cosplay as Grog out of meteorite.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's crazy-go-nuts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Find me on Twitter. Let's talk about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Matt, go for a party member kill."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Happy birthday!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The monsters are heroes, the characters are invaders murdering those poor creatures. You guys "all rock." GoodLordHerc donated $10. "Playing D&D since 2001. Love the show, keep on rolling." LeonicSaber donated $10. "Hope this donation helps and gives you guys a--"

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Dope-ass effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dope-ass effect." There we go. My brain and eyes. Ugh. GrimProspect, ten bucks. "Absolutely "love you guys. Had a pretty awful day but hearing Travis do his amazing Roy Mustang voice could make "it all better."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Best response ever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey. Hey I'm Roy Mustang.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five bucks. "Ashley, as an actual rocket scientist that will never get into space. I just "wanted to say that your dream is my dream."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Inspire us all and never stop reaching for the stars."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sepherie, 100 bucks. "I introduced my college "roommate and best friend to play D&D. 15 years later, we've lost touch. Found out we both watch "this show. We watch most Thursdays now. Thanks for being so--" (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're getting married next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Misplaced connections.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JoshPotato66 donated five bucks. "I love this show. It's like great theatre. Can't wait to "see how far this thing goes and can't wait to see some D&D at some point in the near future. P.S. I "have to admit I have a little crush on Pike, Vex, and Keyleth."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So the girls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're offended. I'm offended.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: LessThanThree." AbowFard donated 25 bucks. "Happy "to donate to a good cause. Thanks for the great entertainment each week. I look forward to many of "your adventures and also playing 5e D&D with my kids." Arandis donated 25 bucks. "Awesome job with "the show as always. Donating in the hopes it inspires you in your upcoming battles as you help "others battle lack of education and illiteracy in the real world." That's awesome. Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Word.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Read book good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gin2343 donated 50 bucks. "Love your game and enjoy it every week. All my brothers and "sisters in the military branches, I wish you a very happy Memorial Day. To all others, take a "moment in your day off to toast those who served and those who still serve."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, hear hear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Watching all of you has inspired me. Tons of "inspiration made my campaign so much better. Thank you all for the high end of my week." Thank you for watching.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: XDragonRiderX donated 20 bucks. "Hey guys, got a chance to talk to Matt and Marisha at Philly "the other week. And we talked to most of you via Twitter."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's Becca.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here's to Critical Role, my now-favorite part of "the week. Hearing all these amazing characters has finally moved toward my dream of being a voice "actor. On a side note, Liam, can you do a few lines of Illidan for me? I'm prepared for it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Love you guys. Also, made a matching donation to 826 here in Chicago, too." Aww.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 826 Chicago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: LoneWolfAvesty, 50 bucks. "Thank you all for making the best 3+ hours of each week for me. I'm "either sitting on the edge of my seat or laughing out loud for reals. Love you all."

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: Thank you, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kieris, 10 bucks. "We wanted to play D&D for years and due to Critical Role I started to DM for "my online friends who had never played. We used Tabletop Simulator. Played for the past few days "and having a blast. Thank you so much for your inspiration, humor and awesomeness."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so cool.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: During the chaos. Thank the party for handling that boss battle really well.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ORION
lines.text: That's debatable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if we handled it well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The DM says we're doing it well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We kicked its ass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We came, we saw, we didn't die permanently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're just a Negative Nancy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't want it. It's gone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We tried, at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't even have my fucking axe, man.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: You guys, we made 3000 subs and I have a promise to keep. I don't expect any of you to, but Erika and Hector have come back from home.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Erika and Hector!

lines.name: ERIKA
lines.text: Dancing time! (laughter)

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Erika is unfazed by the late night and is ready to dance. I cannot say the same for myself.

lines.name: ERIKA
lines.text: Any time, any place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we also have a couple people in the studio that should at least say hello before they leave, too.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We're going to start getting ready for dancing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You gotta say hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [end of captions]
